35a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / seMs
35a6('bum): can yongs su smyind par bya bar 'dod pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdud par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin+d+ra ba dang / tshig bstand pa dang / sbyin pa dang / chag bsnyen
35a7('bum): pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa ste/ rab 'byor sa don gyi dbang de mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
35a8('bum): chen po rnams kyi stond pa dang / pha dang ma dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyabs dang / 'gon yin no zhes brjod do// rab 'byor da de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzhan
35b1('bum): kyi dring myi 'jog par bya bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi 'dring myi 'jig pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
35b2('bum): bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smyind par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
35b3('bum): chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya bar de dag shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di las rgya cher bstand to// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i
35b4('bum): mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa ka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de nam mkha' ltar chags pa mye dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// 
35b5('bum): rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa' ni mtshan nyi/ da myed pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mtshan nyid gang yang myed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
35b6('bum): mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
35b7('bum): stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
35b8('bum): rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o// chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa'o// rab 'byor de rnam grangs
36a1('bum): des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi lag ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad yod do// rab 'byor kyis
36a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang dben la/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong na/ sems can rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang
36a3('bum): byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar myi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur/ rnam/ 
36a4('bum): par byang bar yang myi 'gyur/ dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la chos gang
36a5('bum): yang myi dmyigs/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la sem/ sa can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de// lta bu myi dmyigs na/ bcom ldan 'das bstand pa
36a6('bum): pa de'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom lnga na 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de ci snyam du sems sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang
36a7('bum): bdag gau zhes bya ba la spyad dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag kar bgyi ba la sems can rnams/ 
36a8('bum): kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khod par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar na sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa yin te/ gang la bdag tu bya ba myed/ 
36b1('bum): pa de la 'dzind pa myed/ gang la 'dzind pa myed pa de la sems can kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor ba myed de/ de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang myed pas/ rab 'byor de de ltar na sems can
36b2('bum): rnams kyi rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs la myi spyod/ tshor ba la myi spyod/ 'du shes la myi spyo
36b3('bum): 'du byed la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la myi spyod// myig la myi spyod/ rna ba la myi spyod/ sna la myi spyod/ lce la myi spyod/ lus la myi spyod/ yid la myi spyod do// gzugs la myi spyod/ sgra la myi
36b4('bum): myi spyod/ dri la myi spyod/ ro la myi spyod/ reg la myi spyod/ chos la myi spyod do// myig gi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ rna ba/ 'arnam par shes pa la myi spyad/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi
36b5('bum): myi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
36b6('bum): lo mya spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i la myi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
36b7('bum): kyi ma tshor ba lo myi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis rno ba la myi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis rlobs myi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus
36b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myi spyod do// sa'i khams la myi spyod/ chu'i khams la myi spyod/ mye'i khams la myi spyod/ rlung gi
37a1('bum): khams la myi spyod na/ nam mkha'i khams la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa khams la myi spyod do// ma rig pa la myi spyod/ 'du byed la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ mying dang / 
37a2('bum): gzugs la myi spyod/ skye mched drug la myi spyod/ reg pa la myi spyod/ tshor ba la myi spyod/ sred pa la myi spyod/ le nad pa la myi spyod/ srid pa myi spyod/ skye ba la mya spyad/ skye ba la myi spyod
37a3('bum): rga shi la myi spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyirang
37a4('bum): pa la myi spyod/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// / nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ 
37a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ don dam pa ste/ nga po nyid la myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ 
37a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong
37a7('bum): pa nyid la myi spyod/ chos thams cad spyod pa nyid la myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ mya ri migs pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ dngos po byed pa stong po nyid la myi spyod/ dza
37a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ dra pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
37b1('bum): pa rnams la myi spyod/ dbang po rnams la myi spyod/ stobs rnams la myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan laka rnams la myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa/ 
37b2('bum): nas la myi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams la myi spyod/ chad myed pa rnams la myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod/ rnam par thard pa brgyad la myi spyod/ mthar kyis
37b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa'i stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la myi spyod// mngon par shes pa rnams la myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzid/ 
37b4('bum): rnams la myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la myi spyod/ kazungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lo myi spyod/ myi 'dzags pa bzhi la myi spyod/ so so
37b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi la myi spyod/ byams pa chen po la myi spyod/ snying rje chen po la myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la myi spyod do// rgyun tu zhugs
37b6('bum): po'i 'bras bu la myi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la myi spyod/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la myi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la myi spyod/ rang byang chub la myi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
37b7('bum): la myi spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ltar 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mya
37b8('bum): dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis myi thub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod
38a1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil kyis gnon par myi nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ 
38a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchi pa'i gnas zild kyis myi gnon pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid yang la bgyid
38a3('bum): pa dang ma bral ba ni zild kyis myi gnon pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa lags so// 
38a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor dag la te 'dzam bu'i gling mas can ji snyed pa de dag pas pad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur da te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
38a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom
38a6('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la ston/ 
38a7('bum): pa dang / 'chad pa dang gzhos sa sa shozhon pa dang / 'greld pa dang / rnam par byed pa dang / yang dag par smon pa byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirid pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas nas
38a8('bum): bar spyod pa ni// de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da kal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par
38b1('bum): gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam mtsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 
38b2('bum): rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu rung du byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ci snyam du sem
38b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel la/ gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo po// bde bar gsheg pa yang ngo // bco ldan 'das kyi bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
38b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog/ pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal/ 
38b5('bum): bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod rnams mang du 'phel lo// rab
38b6('bum): 'byor da gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems casha kang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi lus thob par gyurd te/ bla na myed po yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
38b7('bum): bAr la sangs rgyas par gyur la de dag nam mtsho' bar du zhugs pa'i la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rime kror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ pu dud du byas/ mchod par byas
38b8('bum): te/ dge ba rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
39a1('bum): mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs/ 
39a2('bum): kyi bu mo gas pa rtse rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / byed/ 
39a3('bum): par stond pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'a dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor dkal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi/ 
39a4('bum): sa kyi mas can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par dmyi'i lus thob par gyur da te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
39a5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur da la/ de dganam masngo bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas
39a6('bum): bu dung du byas/ mchod par byas/ mchad par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ rigs
39a7('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol dra pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
39a8('bum): rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel
39b1('bum): dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ rnam par spyod na de'i bsod nams ches
39b2('bum): mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes rna gang ji med pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
39b3('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur da la/ de dag nam mtsho'i bar bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rim gror byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud du byas
39b4('bum): mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
39b5('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa ba com ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / tsam ldan 'das mang nga// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
39b6('bum): ba/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang // 
39b7('bum): 'greld pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams
39b8('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur da la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la/ 
40a1('bum): la zhig gis dge ba'i 'ama'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / chad myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa bzhal rab tu bkud
40a2('bum): pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang // rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir/ 
40a3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par
40a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi
40a5('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu'i ma rgyus mang du 'phel lam gso lad pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa ma nga // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
40a6('bum): 'byor dade de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / 
40a7('bum): rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor dgal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang
40a8('bum): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par mye'i lus thob par gyurd la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam ka tan
40b1('bum): bzhi la rab du bkod pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyu na tu zhugs/ 
40b2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyar mya ngang ba' 'bras bu la bkad pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
40b3('bum): la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge bI tsa la de yang bla na myed pa yA dag pA rdzog pa byeng chub tu myo su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de de ci snyam skyeseM sa// rigs kyi bu 'a rig/ 
40b4('bum): mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bas
40b5('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / ma par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel
40b6('bum): pa dang / rna bar 'byed pa dang / gsupa byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa de 'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams
40b7('bum): cad snga phyi myed par mya'i lus thob par gyur da la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / 
40b8('bum): chad myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa dang / rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu
41a1('bum): bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ongadra ba'i 'bras bu la rab du bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ba kau du bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu
41a2('bum): bkod pa du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtse ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na
41a3('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
41a4('bum): de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chang dpa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 
41a5('bum): 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar// byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da gal te stong
41a6('bum): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur da la de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
41a7('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang // bsam gtan bzhi la bkod pa dang / chad myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa bzhi la rab tu
41a8('bum): bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang // rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi
41a9('bum): byang chub ngu yongs su bsngos na/ rang 'tshor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi du ma rigs kyi bu 'o// 
41b1('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra btsam pa nyid la rab du bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab du bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang / 
41b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge bo'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ci snyam du sems/ rigs
41b3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
41b4('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rags kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab
41b5('bum): tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na de'i/ bsod rnams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da gal te
41b6('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par rgyu rad la de dag kyang sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
41b7('bum): dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / chang myang ba bzhi la rab tu bkad pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod
41b8('bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa la rab tu bkod pa dang // rgyu tu zhug po po'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bul rab tu
42a1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag
42a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
42a3('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chang
42a4('bum): pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par bston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du
42a5('bum): 'phel lo// rab 'byor de de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sem// sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/ pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par 'byed pa na
42a6('bum): sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par byang chub sems
42a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can kang yang myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'amo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
42a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po mngon par ba bsgrub ste/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad gsad par gyur pa dang 'dra ba ste/ de dag
42b1('bum): de dag snying rje chen po thob bo// de dag rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod pa sa/ yad yod pa dga' bar 'gyur te/ de ngag mga' ba chen po mngon par bsgrub bo// de dag mtshan ma
42b2('bum): mtshan ma de dag dang lhan cig tu myi gnas te/ de dag btang snyoms chen po thob bo// rab 'byor da de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/ 'di ltar
42b3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni snang po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni snang ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni snang ba'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa na snang ba'o// 
42b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni snang ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mngon par rdzog
42b5('bum): par sangs rgyas kyang sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gan sa su gyur da te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog go// de dag shes rab kyi
42b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par la spyod pa'i phyir su'i gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / ma la cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad la yongs su dpyod pa'i gtong
42b7('bum): ba dang / sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor de de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
42b8('bum): po don yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyad par 'dod pa dang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi lam stond par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen pos 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / 
43a1('bum): khams gsum gyi brtson pan gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongs su 'grol bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bla na myed po'i shes rab kyi myig bskyed par 'dod pas
43a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun do myi 'chad par gnas par bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
43a3('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par myi spyod na yang des yid la bya ba gzhan gi go skabs myi 'byed ste/ des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis
43a4('bum): nyin mtshan du myi gtong zhing brtson par gnas par bya'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na sngon chad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la/ des dus gzhan zhig
43a5('bum): na nor bu rin po che de snyed par gyur te/ des nor bu rin po/ che de snyed pas/ dka' ba dang spro ba dang / yid la ba ba de dang ldan par gyur pa las des nor bu rin po che rnyed
43a6('bum): ma thag tu stor par gyur da na/ de'i rgyu sdug bsngal ba dang yod myi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur da te/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'cha da par gyi lud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che dang
43a7('bum): bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa shra stag rgyu nad tu 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che snyam du bsams ste/ 
43a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor par myi bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba mang po dang / 
43b1('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das yid sa kyi ba de dag dang thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang
43b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyi ba dang ma 'bral ba lags/ bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' myi dmyigs na/ yid la bgyi ba
43b3('bum): myi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams
43b4('bum): cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ma mdzad do/ chos rnams kyi chos
43b5('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid/ da dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid du chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas ma yin
43b6('bum): no zhes bya bar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang ma bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
43b7('bum): tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de la 'phel ba myed do// yongs su 'grib pa myed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyus gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu
43b8('bum): phyi nad pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la yang dag par
44a1('bum): 'byung zhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub/ 
44a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par byung yang 'phel ba 'am/ yongs su 'grib pa myed de/ de bzhin nyid la yongs su 'grib pa myed do// chos kyi
44a3('bum): dbyings la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa myed do// yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'phel ba 'am yangs su 'phel ba yongs su 'grib pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44a4('bum): phyi nad pa ni gcig kyang ma yin/ gnyis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor da gal te de skad du bshad pa la byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'dzum myi 'god
44a5('bum): 'jigs/ myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
44a6('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// zhes bya bar rdzogs par rig par bya'o// #
44a7('bum): bam po bzhi pa'o// // rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid
44a8('bum): dang / gsog nyid dang / gso bo nyid dang / rag lus pa dang / snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
44b1('bum): rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gu sol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinod pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i// chos gang yang dmyigs su mchis
44b2('bum): rje bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal dra pa ma rab 'byor da de na mi yin no// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das mi lag/ ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
44b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mi lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
44b4('bum): 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lags stong pa nyid las gud na stong pa nyid spyod dam/ bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma
44b5('bum): yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mi lags/ ka/ zugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol
44b6('bum): da tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags 'du shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das je legs/ 'du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
44b7('bum): spyad dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ 
44b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags myig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam
45a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji lags na bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags snga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
45a2('bum): dza lags lugs rab kyu pha ral tu phyind pa la spyad dam/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags lde shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod das/ bcom ldan 'das su ma zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
45a3('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das khring shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor do nam 'an nor ba 'byor dag so su/ bcom ldan 'das
45a4('bum): lags ji lags gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa la spyod dom/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags spal shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
45a5('bum): 'das rje lags dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
45a6('bum): lags reg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags chos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
45a7('bum): rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs myig gi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyod dang/ rjod nga da'i de yin pa shesar gyi yo
45a8('bum): legs sde'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags lce'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan
45b1('bum): ldan 'das mi lags lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
45b2('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor kyis kas la pa
45b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji legs myig gi 'dus te reg galags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod dem/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
45b4('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ca lags sna'i 'a/ sa te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lce 'i 'dus te reg pa shes
45b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'a/ das ni lags lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags
45b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa la spyad dam/ bcom ldan 'das ciyig yid kyi 'dus te reg pa n+de ba kyi pha rosang du phyi dad pas spyod dam med pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags myig
45b7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod dmas du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung 'i cho ban+de rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sna'i
45b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam co da gso smye sa rgya rje shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa lo spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na
45b9('bum): na 'das kyi ka' la / rab khyor de ni ma yid do// rab 'arkyen khyim gal
46a1('bum): shes kyi so tu byin kya pyodade bcom ldan 'das ci legs yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab
46a2('bum): 'byar kyis gsal pa/ rab 'byor nga de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gso lad pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags sa'i khams gos rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
46a3('bum): ji lags chu'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mye'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dru
46a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa ci lags nam mkha'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
46a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol/ 
46a6('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags ma rig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
46a7('bum): 'das kyi lags mying dang gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mying dang gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
46a8('bum): ci lags skye mched drug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags reg pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags tshor ba
46b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'du mi gas sred pa ni rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags le nad pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
46b2('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs srid pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags skye ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
46b3('bum): 'das ci legs rga shi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
46b4('bum): ci lags sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol
46b5('bum): du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags pa u
46b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags pas gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
46b7('bum): 'das ji lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab
46b8('bum): 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyi stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha
47a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyi nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags stong pa nyid
47a2('bum): stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags chen po stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ni lags don dam
47a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
47a4('bum): lags 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu byand pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
47a5('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sogs myedapa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyodam bcom ldan 'das kyi ga shes rab kyi pha rol
47a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyind pa la spyad dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
47a7('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha
47a8('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dngos po myong pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu
47b1('bum): phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes/ 
47b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags dran pa nye bar gzhag
47b3('bum): pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yang dag par spong ba zhi no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags su
47b4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyo de dam/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags dbang po lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
47b5('bum): sgobs lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dpa bcom ldan 'das kyi lags byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun na/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod das/ bcom ldan
47b6('bum): ldan 'das tsho lags 'phags pa'i lam yan log brkyang ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam / bcom ldan 'das kyi lags 'phags pa'i bden pa 'o zhi shes rab kyi pha rolam
47b7('bum): tu byed pa sa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sogs pasam gtan bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyirnyeng po la spyod dus/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs cad myed pa rnams shes rab kyi pha ros sa
47b8('bum): phyin mas spyo ma bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa'i ni gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par 'ar dri/ 
48a1('bum): brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das myi lags mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ 
48a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji legs rnam par thard pa'i ske stong po nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mngon par shes
48a3('bum): pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ting nge 'dzind rnams shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzungs kyi
48a4('bum): sgo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom
48a5('bum): ldan 'das ci legs myi 'jigs pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
48a6('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags snying rje chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes rab kyi
48a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rgyu nad du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lan cig phyir 'ong
48a8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi legs phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ 'a 'i ga cwa nyid tu kyi
48b1('bum): la spyod dpa / mam ldan 'das dza~M lags byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
48b2('bum): ci lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor dkyis
48b3('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / bsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma
48b4('bum): nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas/ nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
48b5('bum): dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso/ 
48b6('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos
48b7('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed po nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs
48b8('bum): 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
49a1('bum): kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam
49a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mi lags 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid
49a3('bum): dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis kyi khyang
49a4('bum): pa'i dbyings re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ni lags rnam par shes pa stong po nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus
49a5('bum): pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / me nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid
49a6('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / yang+ya du sa do sa sus kyis kyi khyab pa'i dbying sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa spyod dam/ ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ 
49a7('bum): 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags myig gi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po

51b5('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam
51b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 
51b7('bum): ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yidi de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
51b8('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus
52a1('bum): pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi
52a2('bum): gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
52a3('bum): rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying
52a4('bum): po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang mo nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nyid
52a5('bum): skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rna ba'i 'dus
52a6('bum): te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos
52a7('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag po'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ 
52a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags snga'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / gsoko nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no rad pa
52b1('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam kyis myi
52b2('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / 
52b3('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid da/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / 
52b4('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de ge/ sa rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
52b5('bum): 'das ci lags lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid da/ pa/ snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang
52b6('bum): ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / snang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de
52b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang
52b8('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi dbying nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis rmyi
53a1('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
53a2('bum): ci lags myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa
53a3('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi
53a4('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de ma/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob
53a5('bum): nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
53a6('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
53a7('bum): ci lags sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa
53a8('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gyis dang / tshab kyi nan ni de chos sngon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab
53b1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma
53b2('bum): mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan mo yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / ying dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
53b3('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings re shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs us kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob
53b4('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi
53b5('bum): dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon mye// da pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
53b6('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi 'dus te re ka pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa
53b7('bum): nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang
53b8('bum): dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / ragasos
53b9('bum): ldan 'das kyis dmamatshaya / rab 'byor de ni rimamo ngas byord kyis gsol
54a1('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nod pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chom nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang
54a2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / 
54a3('bum): rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas
54a4('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid nga / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam kyis myi khyab po'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mye'i kha
54a5('bum): kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag/ lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhi na nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
54a6('bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom
54a7('bum): ldan 'das ci lags rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nod pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
54a8('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
54b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid
54b2('bum): dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / da la gyis dang / ras kyig nas nyid du pa rji rig pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gas myi khyab pa'i dbyings
54b3('bum): de zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma
54b4('bum): mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa
54b5('bum): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khya// ba pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod// dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
54b6('bum): 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ com ldan 'das ci lags ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid dang / sog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / 
54b7('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos
54b8('bum): skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid pa
55a1('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
55a2('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
55a3('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma
55a4('bum): nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang // 
55a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold du/ phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das lags shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyi dad pa la spyod dang / bcom ldan 'das
55a6('bum): ci lags mying dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor po de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
55a7('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
55a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
55b1('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
55b2('bum): dang / bsam gyis myi khyab po'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid
55b3('bum): dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / 
55b4('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / ba/ sam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi/ nad pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshor ba'i
55b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhi na nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin// 
55b6('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi
55b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sred pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
55b8('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang / 
56a1('bum): dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lend pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
56a2('bum): dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa rji dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
56a3('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
56a4('bum): lags srid pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / ka/ so ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid da dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dngadagan
56a5('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang nga bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha
56a6('bum): rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ni lags skye ba stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang
56a7('bum): ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
56a8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags rga shi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid
56b1('bum): dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nod pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / 
56b2('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
56b3('bum): de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / 
56b4('bum): snying po ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid da/ nga/ chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / 
56b5('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol dudu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
56b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
56b7('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam/ 
56b8('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / 
57a1('bum): rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nodad pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / 
57a2('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags
57a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no dad pa de bzhin nyid
57a4('bum): dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / sa kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyo// na myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
57a5('bum): kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind/ pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog
57a6('bum): nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
57a7('bum): kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gan nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ brtso
57a8('bum): ldan 'das ci lags shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa la stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 
57b1('bum): ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
57b2('bum): phyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'dra
57b3('bum): ci lags nang stong pa nyid sa gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nodad pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
57b4('bum): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha
57b5('bum): rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ni laH/ sa phyi stong pa nyid a gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
57b6('bum): de bzhin nyid dang sa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
57b7('bum): bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci laklas phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang
57b8('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no rid pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
58a1('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang
58a2('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / mdod pa de bzhin nyid dang / na pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyis
58a3('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
58a4('bum): 'das ni lags chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gso ga nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / sI dang po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma
58a5('bum): nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi/ gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag
58a6('bum): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
58a7('bum): dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma masmi nyid/ de bzhin da / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos
58a8('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos spyod myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / dmam gyis mya lel pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ni lags 'dus
58b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan sa yI de bzhi nyid
58b2('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
58b3('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang
58b4('bum): ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi sa/ nas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag
58b5('bum): pa'i mtha'i dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dus ci lags mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong
58b6('bum): pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid
58b7('bum): dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
58b8('bum): phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong po nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis
59a1('bum): pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon
59a2('bum): myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / 
59a3('bum): gsog ni gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid
59a4('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rang
59a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso// ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid// dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
59a6('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
59a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags chos thams cad stong pa nyid gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid
59a8('bum): dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos sbyor myed pa nyid dang / 
59b1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang
59b2('bum): bsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nod pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / 
59b3('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsdam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom
59b4('bum): ldan 'das ci lags myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma
59b5('bum): nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid da / pa/ chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi skyon myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
59b6('bum): dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsod
59b7('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no dad pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / 
59b8('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lag pa
60a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsobo nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma/ 
60a2('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab
60a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi da gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
60a4('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de cazhin nyid das/ chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
60a5('bum): bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// 
60a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol bam po ma / rab 'byor kyis gso
60a7('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 
60a8('bum): nod pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
60b1('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / 
60b2('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no rad pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed
60b3('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog
60b4('bum): nyid dang / bsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po dam mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
60b5('bum): tu rgyas nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis/ myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
60b6('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nod pa
60b7('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis rmyi
60b8('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / 'ang ze
61a1('bum): mamachis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / mnod pa de bzhin nyid dang / spyan nus yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chom sbyor myed pa/

61a3('bum): nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings

61a5('bum): 'das ci lags 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong / pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag du sa pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis po nyid dang / de bzhin
61a6('bum): nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
61a7('bum): dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid

61b4('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso dpa nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang /

61b7('bum): dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /

62a1('bum): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus
62a2('bum): pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang/

62a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / bsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po/ ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang // gzhin ma
62a5('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab
62a6('bum): pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gso
62a7('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi

62b1('bum): 'das ci lags mngon par shes pa'i rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nodad pa de bzhin nyid dang /

62b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de
62b4('bum): bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang /
