62b7('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
62b8('bum): dam bcom ldan 'das ci lags de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsopa nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhirdo/ 
63a1('bum): nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
63a2('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / 
63a3('bum): raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas
63a4('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
63a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / kaso// ka nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snyi nga po mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
63a6('bum): ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
63a7('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus
63a8('bum): pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid
63b1('bum): dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags snying rje chen po'i stong pa
63b2('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos
63b3('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
63b4('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog/ nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / 
63b5('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no/ pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas// 
63b6('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dmabacom ldan 'das mi lags rgyu nad tu
63b7('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / raka lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no rad pa de bzhin nyid dang / kun
63b8('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de
64a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / 
64a2('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed
64a3('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / 
64a4('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
64a5('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha/ 'a dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab
64a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci logs dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
64a7('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag/ 
64a8('bum): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lags rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang
64b1('bum): rag lum pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no pa de bzhin nyid dang / sa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid
64b2('bum): dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
64b3('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
64b4('bum): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa/ de'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
64b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa ci lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sdod pa'i 8nga/ gsog dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying
64b6('bum): po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / mnod pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed
64b7('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kyis gsolang
64b8('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
65a1('bum): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol
65a2('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ci snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
65a3('bum): du phyind pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ci snyam du sems/ chos gang khyod kyis
65a4('bum): mthong ba'i chos de dmyigs su yod dam/ gsol pa bco ma ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ci snyam du sems/ 
65a5('bum): chos gang dmyigs su myed pa de skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur/ ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni me lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 
65a6('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mye skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
65a7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan / rab 'byor de 'di ni stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
65a8('bum): rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa/ de ltar rtsol te de bsad pa ni bla na
65b1('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par myi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
65b2('bum): ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
65b3('bum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mi lags chos thams cad kyi myi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las
65b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyuraram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
65b5('bum): rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bco ldan 'das kyi sags gas te skye ba'ang ma lags myi skye ba'i'ang ma lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed
65b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstand tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te skye ba yan
65b7('bum): ma lags pakyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bskrun par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
65b8('bum): rab 'byor da de tsa snyam du sems// gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol dpa bcom
66a1('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstand par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma
66a2('bum): mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang
66a3('bum): bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
66a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po na 'di snyam du de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'cha/ rgyu bar bya'o// 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
66a5('bum): bya'o zhes bya bar myi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ra ba 'byor da de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam
66a6('bum): par rtog pa de thams cad myed pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam par myi rtog pa'o// #// shes rab kyi pha rol
66a7('bum): du phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan
66a8('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi nang tu dben pa'i slad duzab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
66b1('bum): phyind pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du lta bka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shinang tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dga' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
66b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ni shin du dben pa'i slad du brtag du ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi nang du dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o// 
66b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi nang du dben pa'i slad du zhi ba 'phro ba zhib pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi nad tu dben pa'i slad du mkhas shing
66b4('bum): rig par rtog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzind pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par
66b5('bum): byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la nan tan byed cing bla na myed pa la/ nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sa ngas rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos
66b6('bum): gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha
66b7('bum): rolang du phyind pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzind pa dang / 'chur cing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzos
66b8('bum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dpa sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go 'byed pa de dag ni dag pa'i rtsa ba ba ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ 'jam bu'i glang ga
67a1('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur / bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur du/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur da/ gzun
67a2('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur das/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu la la zhig gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind cing
67a3('bum): 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed par gyur da te/ bzung shing bcangs te blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin du nan tan byed na/ ke'u shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des barmyi lnga nye
67a4('bum): 'gro'o// stong gi cher yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// brgya phrag sdong rgya char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char
67a5('bum): yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye ba ra myaM 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gre'o// grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / 
67a6('bum): dpe' dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do/ de nA dge slong gcig kacig kis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / 
67a7('bum): ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni rigs
67a8('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzind pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
67b1('bum): byed pa dang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan ki ko mya 'byed pa de dag gis zild
67b2('bum): kyis dond to// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge sbyong de la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam
67b3('bum): gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
67b4('bum): chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sem sa dang po bskyed pas kyang zild kyis non na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
67b5('bum): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid/ la byed pa dang / bzung zhing 'chang ste blags shing kun chub par// byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci
67b6('bum): dgos te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnon cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 
67b7('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bi yid kyis mnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra
67b8('bum): bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/ byang chub mos dpa' mes dpa' rno po deni gyi chub sel dan med man po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang
68a1('bum): bral ba de dag kyang zil kyis non cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yang ma zad de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'
68a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang tshul thos kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba de dag zil kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims
68a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa # kyi
68a4('bum): byed pa dang bral ba kang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zild kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rold du phyind pa la spyod// bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
68a5('bum): chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral
68a6('bum): ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub
68a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rold du phyind pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zi lad kyis mnon
68a8('bum): cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
68b1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa la ci skad du bstand pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan par myi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
68b2('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la ji skad du bstand pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad
68b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun myi 'chad pa'i don du gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du myi 'byed de// de ltar bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'
68b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub las 'phang bar myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sems dpa' chan pa dan sems can bying ba rnams gdond par
68b5('bum): 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rje/ na po'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa
68b6('bum): la slob pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi slob pa la slob pa ma yin no// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar sems te nye bar
68b7('bum): dong zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po myu rang du slobs shig/ skyes bu chen po sbyin par spobs shig/ lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyi snying po byang chub du 'dug ste/ bla na myed pa yang
68b8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par sangs rgyas nas blang bar bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing
69a1('bum): stond to// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams
69a2('bum): dang lhan cig du 'dong bar sems so// de'i drung du bdag kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'chem yang 'che ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan
69a3('bum): cig tu 'gro ba ra sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dpa lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul sa yang 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan
69a4('bum): cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang / zhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig gro bar sems so// tshangs pa myi mched kyi bdag po yang
69a5('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar dong bar sem sa so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar
69a6('bum): sems so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// myi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dor bar sems so// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ 
69a7('bum): shining du mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong par sems so// gya nom snang ba'i lharna mas kyang nye bar 'dong par sems so// kye dam snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dor bar sems pa/ 
69a8('bum): gnas gtsang ma ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye gapa 'dong par sems so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni de bzhin gshog/ 
69b1('bum): ba rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyad pa'i de'i lus ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan
69b2('bum): gyis gnon par byas pa gang ni snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la myi 'byung myi 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
69b3('bum): du phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ ramyig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus
69b4('bum): kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad kang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la myi 'byung myi 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems da ched shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
69b5('bum): zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya/ 'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dka'o 'di snyam du gyur te/ lA 'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha
69b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di stond cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i yon tan legs par brjod dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus stond snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis che dang
69b7('bum): ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
69b8('bum): stend pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di skad ces bka'
70a1('bum): stsal pa/ dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i yon tan/ 
70a2('bum): dang legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs so// dka' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
70a3('bum): tu phyind pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas
70a4('bum): bdud sdika to can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i ma tha' mngon du bya ste/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / 
70a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin ba'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
70a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dogs pa bsnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang kang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang/ 
70a7('bum): pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa
70a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la byed pa des sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / 
70b1('bum): shum par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba dang / skar la ltung ba gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
70b2('bum): 'das ci lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dka' bo byang
70b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no// dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur
70b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dka' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di stond pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma
70b5('bum): byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // ga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ 'di/ 
70b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse bas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
70b7('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na des dge ba'i bshes gnyen myi mthong bas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di myi thos so// ma thos pas myi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
70b8('bum): pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan myi byed do// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de yang bdud sdig to can gyis rlags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dka' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems
71a1('bum): dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzind pa byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dka'
71a2('bum): po gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang ma yin
71a3('bum): ba'i chos bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i mang po'i nang nas bdag gi grogs su rnyed pa ste/ 
71a4('bum): de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis sa dgacig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni de bdag gis bsam pa
71a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ dga' bo byad chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyi glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
71a6('bum): 'di lta bu la bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shi nang du shes rab
71a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi nad tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang / bzung ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par
71a8('bum): byas pas kyang ji zhig bya/ ngas kyang de'i gting ma snyed na khyod kyis lta snyed re skan zhes zer na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can gyis klags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dag
71b1('bum): bo gzhan gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa bskyed cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol
71b2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni 'a brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyad pa'o// da ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'o// 
71b3('bum): nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'o// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ khyod ni
71b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
71b5('bum): spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// zhes rlom sems byed no/ dag/ 'bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis
71b6('bum): glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan gang ka tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na/ dga' bo de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dka' ba dang spro ba dang / nyams bde ba
71b7('bum): dang / rab du dka' ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis klags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi
71b8('bum): che byang chub sems dpa'i mying brjod dam/ rus brjod dam/ kun tu grags par 'gyur na/ de mying brjod pa 'am/ rus brjod pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i
72a1('bum): chos dag khyad du gsod cing bdag stod gzhan la smod la phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de
72a2('bum): la myed par rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan ma myed pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing / bdag stong gzhan la smod de 'di skad du 'di ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
72a3('bum): la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par myi snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par myi snang ngo // zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems
72a4('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la myi snyan par brjod cing smod na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems bdag gi gnas ni stongs par myi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / 
72a5('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul yang shin du 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci na sa kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud
72a6('bum): sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/ de'i tshig bzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par bya bas sems te/ de la de dag gis thos sam mthong na
72a7('bum): na 'gyur te/ de dag g-i rlom mthong nam sun spyo dri zhin gror te/ de dag de ni du slo man yide bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i che/ nyon mongs pa shind tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de dag bsam pa phyi nad ci log tu
72a8('bum): 'gyur bas/ lus dang rag dang yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad myi 'dod pa dang / myi sdug pa dang / yid du myi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sems can dmyal ba
72b1('bum): de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang pi dgas kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi las kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga'
72b2('bum): bo don gyi dbang de mthong bas bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang spro ba dang / smra ba dang tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dka' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
72b3('bum): gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang bcod cing / nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyis khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thas cad mkhyen
72b4('bum): pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang nye bar gyur dpyi yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thab mo dang rtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'chang
72b5('bum): 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo// de ni byol song gi skye gnas ki lam mo/ de ni gshin rje'i 'jig
72b6('bum): rten gyi lam mo/ de ni rna ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// dka' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa dang gang zag byang chub
72b7('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing 'tshang 'bru na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ring du byed pa'o// 
72b8('bum): 'dri gnyis ka yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu mo 'di gnyis kyis gang bsams pa de ni rnam
73a1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / kashin rje'i 'jig rten las brtsams so// zhes nas dga'
73a2('bum): zhing spro ba dang tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dka' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstand pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung sa bstand pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab
73a3('bum): cing rtsod la 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dru na/ gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su myi gtang zhe na ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems skyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing brjod pa dang / 'khrug cing
73a4('bum): 'chang 'dru bar gyur pa de'i srid kyi bskal par ko cha bko ba/ ra bya'o// dka' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ded dag sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam 'on
73a5('bum): te ma lags kyis bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'tshal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
73a6('bum): kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub sems
73a7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la/ dge zhing myi snyan par brjod pa byas nas phyir myi 'chags par 'dud par 'dzind cing 'on du bzung ste gnas na/ dka' bo gang zag de ni 'byung
73a8('bum): bar myi smra ste/ gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa yongs su myi btang zhe na/ gnod myi za bar bskal pa de snyed du ko cha bgo bar bya'o// dka' bo byang chub sems dpa'
73b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing brtsod de/ gshe ba dang myi snyan par brjod par gyur da na yang 'dud par myi 'dzind la phyin chad sdom par 'dzind cing bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nye bar thob te/ bdag
73b2('bum): gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smra ba la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par 'gyur ba bya dgos na/ de ltar bdag la gzhan
73b3('bum): myi snyan par smra zhing phyir bzlogs pa ni myi tshul gyis de ltar myi bya'i bdag gis glen pa 'am/ lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o// bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa myed par bya'o/ sems can 'di
73b4('bum): dag ni bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya/ ngan las bzla bar bya bar dgos na de dag nyid la bdag ngan
73b5('bum): sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyi bdag gis de dag la gnod sems myi bya'o// bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par myi bya'o snyam na/ dka'
73b6('bum): bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung bar yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas glags myi rnyed do// dka' bo gzhan yang byang chub sem
73b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par myi bya'o// de dag dang lhan cig/ gnas par myi bya'o// 'dug par myi bya'o// kal te 'dug na yang de su la yang
73b8('bum): gnod sems su myi bya'o// 'khrug par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug pa bya ba 'di ni bdag la gyi tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
74a1('bum): 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar bya ba dag go
74a2('bum): snyam mo// dka' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
74a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na stond pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya'o// de
74a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs te kacig tu zhugs pa 'o// 'dis ji ltar slab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang / bslab par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang
74a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
74a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa
74a7('bum): nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhini stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
74a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye
74b1('bum): bar gzhag pa bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
74b2('bum): brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
74b3('bum): dgu dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
74b4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / pa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
74b5('bum): brgyad dang / thams cad ge ba nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang la hA slab par bya'o snyam du sems skyed do// des gzhan yang
74b6('bum): sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam stond pa ste/ gal te de dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ldan
74b7('bum): bar gyur du na/ de la bdag gis bslab par myi bya ba'i gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na/ bdan
74b8('bum): kis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no// oM rma da// / 
75a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ le'u bzhi bcum bdun pa'o// rgyang bum po/ de nas me dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis/ bcom
75a2('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
75a3('bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor de nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor da phyi sdong
75a4('bum): pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams da kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor da phyi nang stong panyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
75a5('bum): mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byangachub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de chen po stong pa nyid
75a6('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byoradon dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid
75a7('bum): do// rab 'byor da 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// / rab 'byor de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
75a8('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor da thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor da dor ba myed pa stong/ 
75b1('bum): pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de chos thams
75b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa
75b3('bum): nyid do// rab 'byor de myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
75b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de dngos po myed pa'i
75b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni gzug sa kyis stong ngo // tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ngo / 'du shes ni
75b6('bum): 'du shes kyis stong po/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ngo / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // myig ni myig gis stong ngo // rna ba ni rna bas stong ngo // sA ni sna kyis stong ngo // lce ni lces
75b7('bum): stong ngo po// lus ni lus kyis stong ngo // yid ni yid kyis stong ngo // gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // sgra ni spras stong ngo // dri dris stong ngo // ro ni ros stong ngo // reg ni rig gis stong ngo // chos rna
75b8('bum): chos kyis stong ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas
76a1('bum): stong ngo // rnaba'i rnam lde tshags tha mad nganarnam par shes pas steng pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes
76a2('bum): pas stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pas snong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas
76a3('bum): stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong // yid kyi 'dus te
76a4('bum): reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni myog gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang kyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
76a5('bum): tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te re ka pA rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te re ka pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
76a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
76a7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ngo // sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ngo // mye'i khams ni mye'i khams kyis stong ngo // rlung
76a8('bum): ki khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rnam par zhes pas stong ngo // ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ngo // 'du byed ni
76b1('bum): 'du byed kyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis stong ngo // skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ngo // reg pa ni reg pas stong ngo / sred pa
76b2('bum): sred pas stong ngo // sred pa na srid pas snang ba/ lend pa ni lend pas stong ngo // srid pa ni srid pas stong ngo // skye ba ni skye bas stong ngo // rga shi ni rga shis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni sbyin
76b3('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ngo // 
76b4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol da tu phyind pas stong ngo po// bsam gtan ki pha rol tu phyind pa/ ni bsam katan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ngo / shes
76b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo po// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 
76b6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni
76b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
76b8('bum): ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // zlog ma dang zlum myong ba stong pa nyid ni zlog ma dang bla ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dong ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stos
77a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo po// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
77a2('bum): gyis stong ngo / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong ngo // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid
77a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa la ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // 
77a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba na/ mas kyis stong ngo / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni dbang
77a5('bum): po rnams kyis stong ngo / stobs rnams ni stobs rnam sa kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam na
77a6('bum): mas spyong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis spyod do// bsam gtan rnams ni thosas gtan rnams kyis stong ngo // tshad med pa rnams mi chad myed pa rnam
77a7('bum): kyim stong ngo // gzugs skyed pa'i sems par 'dug pa rnams mi gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyis snong ngo // rnam par ba dad pa rnams ninam par tha rad pa rnams kyis rdo
77a8('bum): ngo// mthar kyis gnam pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams yi ma sgra rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma skyed/ 
77b1('bum): pa dang smond pa myed pa ni rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pas spong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin
77b2('bum): rnams ni ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis stong po// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pU stobs rnams kyis stong ngo // 
77b3('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ngo / sangs
77b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / lan cig phyir 'ong
77b5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / ngo// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis
77b6('bum): stong ngo // rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa nyid kyis stong po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
77b7('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rab 'byorade 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa
77b8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das ci legs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs pas par bgyi bal
78a1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
78a2('bum): nan gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob/ 
78a3('bum): pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma/ rnam pa las
78a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'a gag kyi'i srid du na pa zas padag chen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
78a5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob pa rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob la kra / 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bkyi ba'i slad du
78a6('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob par lags sam/ 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slab na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
78a7('bum): pa nyid slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam
78a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'gag par
78b1('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa
78b2('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
78b3('bum): pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
78b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// myig bas par bkyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig 'dod chags dang bral bar
78b5('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags
78b6('bum): sam/ myig myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lag
78b7('bum): sam/ rna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ na ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
78b8('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nar myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna bsa' bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
79a1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snga 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na nam/ 
79a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
79a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lde 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
79a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slad du slob pa lags sam/ lce myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na na ma khams da mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus bas par
79a5('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ slob pa lags sam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
79a6('bum): du slob pa legs sam/ lus 'gag par bkri ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
79a7('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam yid bas bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dod ma dang bral ba bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
79a8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na nas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sid kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob
79b1('bum): mnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// gzugs pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang
79b2('bum): bral bas bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
79b3('bum): gzugs myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ skabs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
79b4('bum): sgra 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ swa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
79b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sma myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri bas par bgyi ba'i
79b6('bum): slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri
79b7('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri'i myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
79b8('bum): robs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
80a1('bum): pa lags sam/ ro 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
80a2('bum): slob pa lags sam/ reg pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
80a3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg 'gag par bgyi bar slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
80a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
80a5('bum): slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa la gas sam/ chos 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos rgya
80a6('bum): skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sum/ 
80a7('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slab na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par
80a8('bum): shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob marnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sas/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i srad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du smin
80b1('bum): pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi bo'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
80b2('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rmi
80b3('bum): par zhes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
80b4('bum): slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes
80b5('bum): pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khye nad pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myi skye ba'ang bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
80b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bos par bgyi ba'i slad du slob mnas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags
80b7('bum): dang bral bar 'gyi ba'i slad du slob narnam pa thams cad ma'i nang pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na nas pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid du smo
80b8('bum): pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du blo ba
81a1('bum): rnam sngamam papa ma khye nga bu nyid du thob pa lags pas/ sum gyi rnam par shes pa 'dod drugs dang bral bar 'gyi ma'i slad du slob narnas pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid du sgom pa lasas sam/ 
81a2('bum): dan na na sa rnam par shes pa 'gag par bsti ba'i srid du sa du/ ma pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid duslob pa lags pas du rgyanas pa gas pa 'gas par bgyi ba'i sla du slob marnam pa la
81a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob ya lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bas
81a4('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa zas
81a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam

85a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lend pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ le nad pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i

85b1('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ srid pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sa sam/ sred

85b7('bum): skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
85b8('bum): pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyird pa 'gag
86a1('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags
