86a3('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
86a4('bum): lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye ba darabagyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bas/ 
86a5('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzad pa'i ba la tu phyin pa nyid du slab pa khams sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
86a6('bum): phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
86a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
86a8('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
86b1('bum): pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar
86b2('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtad kyi pha rol du phyinid pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
86b3('bum): lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind
86b4('bum): pa 'gag pa byed par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob
86b5('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bas pas bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend du slob pa lags sam
86b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i
86b7('bum): slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
86b8('bum): lags sam// nang stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na nam
87a1('bum): pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral 'ang kyi srang du sros la lags so/ 
87a2('bum): rnam pa rnamasas dam khyedad pa nyid du thob pa samasasas/ mang spong ba nyid 'das par 'dri ba'i srad du slob marnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sas/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ste/ 
87a3('bum): 'drag gyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khyen da pa nyid du slob pa lags pas/ phyi stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slobs nas pa thams cad sa khyend pa nyid du slob sanas pa thams cad
87a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// phyi stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sle ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slong
87a5('bum): nanas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam phyi nang stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb mnam po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags las phyi nang / 
87a6('bum): stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dag par 'gyi ba'i slad du slob na nas pa rdzas/ 
87a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i
87a8('bum): slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags/ 
87a9('bum): sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
87a10('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid bas par brgya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
87b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid 'od grangs bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'gas bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
87b2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rod dam pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
87b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dodon dang bras kyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
87b4('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags pa sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
87b5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa/ sa par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
87b6('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
87b7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi skye ba myed par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bas par
87b8('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dod na dgra lnga bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
88a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na nas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob marnam pa thams
88a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
88a3('bum): pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thos
88a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las/ 'das pa pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
88a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lag/ sa sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod
88a6('bum): chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
88a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid/ 
88a8('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bkye bo'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
88b1('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi
88b2('bum): ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
88b3('bum): rang bzhin sto pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob narnam pa
88b4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos
88b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa thams cad stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi bo'i
88b6('bum): srad du slob ma nas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
88b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
88b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyi
89a1('bum): stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
89a2('bum): nan pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral
89a3('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slong na rnam pa
89a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi myigs pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
89a5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na na/ ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
89a6('bum): slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
89a7('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na na pa thu mas
89a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
89b1('bum): nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
89b2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sama'o/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
89b3('bum): pa nyid 'dod kA r+sa bA bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thamasasacad
89b4('bum): byend po nyid du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
89b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// dran pa nye bar ka/ zhag pa bzhibs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye
89b6('bum): bar bzhag pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam
89b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par
89b8('bum): spong ba bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sum/ yang dag par spong ba ba bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
90a1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag
90a2('bum): par spong ba bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
90a3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bkye ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gas
90a4('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nye da du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
90a5('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbang po lnga bas par brgya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbang po lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar
90a6('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbang po lnga 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbang
90a7('bum): po lnga myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob de rnam pa thams
90a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'gag
90b1('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhye dad pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhye da pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi
90b2('bum): yan lag bdun pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
90b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun myi skye
90b4('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
90b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
90b6('bum): slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
90b7('bum): pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob la lags sam/ 'phags pa'i 'amad bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slos
90b8('bum): pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'gag
91a1('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob narnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
91a2('bum): dran ma/ slob pa lags lam/ bsam gtan bzhibs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmo
91a3('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan pa'i 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan
91a4('bum): bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad myed pa bzhi pa sa par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
91a5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chad myed pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad myed pa
91a6('bum): bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad myed pa bzhi myi skye bar brgya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
91a7('bum): lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhibs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
91a8('bum): pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
91b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
91b2('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam
91b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar
91b4('bum): pa brgyad myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar kyis ka/ nas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du
91b5('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lag/ sa sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma
91b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slon
91b7('bum): pa lags sam/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i
91b8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid da/ 
92a1('bum): mtshan mabyed pa dang smod pa myed pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
92a2('bum): ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slab na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar
92a3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i
92a4('bum): tshul gyis na slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slo dab pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags/ dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
92a5('bum): pa nyid du slab na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
92a6('bum): du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam ting nge 'dzind
92a7('bum): rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
92a8('bum): pa nyid du skyob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzi nang rnams kyi skye bar bkyi ma rjo/ 
92a9('bum): slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam gzungs kyi sgo rnams bas pa rab kyi ba'i
92b1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi ske rnams kyi skye bar bkru ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slab pa lags sam/ gzungs
92b2('bum): kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bkye ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i srad du slob na rnam pa
92b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
92b4('bum): stobs bcu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod nadas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
92b5('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sa ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par ba gyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
92b6('bum): slob pa lags sam/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i sto gyi sde par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi bas par bgyi thar
92b7('bum): ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'do ga dasu 'ang bkye ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
92b8('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi lags par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sa sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
93a1('bum): sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
93a2('bum): ni/ 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
93a3('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du
93a4('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'akag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
93a5('bum): snying rje chen po mya skye bar bgyi bo'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du
93a6('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
93a7('bum): pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
93a8('bum): myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ 
93b1('bum): slob pa lags sam/ chu du tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob narnam pa thos kyang mkhyend pa nyid du thob pa lags lam/ rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
93b2('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
93b3('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan ci 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'ong ba'i
93b4('bum): 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du
93b5('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lag/ sa sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar byakyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
93b6('bum): slob pa lags sam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral
93b7('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags
93b8('bum): sam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
94a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa
94a2('bum): nas/ nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
94a3('bum): lags sam/ rang byang chub bas pa kyi srid du dro dan mas cad pa byed pa nyid du / rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bkyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags
94a4('bum): sam/ rang byang chub 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nga chub myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
94a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam
94a6('bum): pa shes pa/ 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
94a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
94a8('bum): pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du smon rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
94b1('bum): cad ma byed pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag par bsti ba'i slad du slob narnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams
94b2('bum): cang mkhyend pa nyid du srab pa lags sam/ rna ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// 
94b3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gnas brta/ na rab 'byor kyis gang 'di skad du gzugs zad par bya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
94b4('bum): yin nam gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi 'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yi mnam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du
94b5('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba zad par bgyi ba'i slad
94b6('bum): du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'gag
94b7('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes zad
95a1('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa/ 
95a2('bum): yin nas/ 'du shes 'gag par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ 'du shes myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
95a3('bum): yin nam/ 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
95a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'gag/ par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad
95a5('bum): du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lag/ sa sam/ rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
95a6('bum): rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
95a7('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// myig zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
95a8('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myigi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa
95b1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ na ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
95b2('bum): yin nam/ rna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
95b3('bum): pa yin nam/ rna ba myi skye bar bgyi ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
95b4('bum): sna 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna 'ag/ dag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
95b5('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
95b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i phyir slob na rnam
95b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
95b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa/ 
96a1('bum): yid kyi skyes bying srol narnam pa khams cad khyed pa nyid du sros lags
96a2('bum): mus kyi skye la byam phyir so na rnams thams cad mkhyed pa la nyid du slo na na/ 
96a3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid zad par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na nam/ 
96a4('bum): nam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam a/ gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
96a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na
96a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin namagazugs myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra zad par bya ba'i
96a7('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob po yi na nam/ sgra 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra
96a8('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri zad par
96a9('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri 'gag par
96a10('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro zad par bya ba'i phyir
96b1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro 'gag par bya'o ba'i
96b2('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro mya skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
96b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob
96b4('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend// pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos zad par bya ba'i phyir
96b5('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin na/ ma/ chos 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slo na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
96b6('bum): chos 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad maskye nad pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// myig
96b7('bum): rnam par shes pa blad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir srog na rnam pa thams cad ma
96b8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
97a1('bum): slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par
97a2('bum): shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
97a3('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
97a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sgo// ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
97a5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rna ma par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thos
97a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang
97a7('bum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
97a8('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
97b1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par
97b2('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par zhes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi
97b3('bum): par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
97b4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'a/ dag par bya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rna par shes pa myi skye
97b5('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
97b6('bum): slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myika gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar
97b7('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khyedad pa nyid du slob pa yin na myaH/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig
97b8('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin
98a1('bum): nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na nam
98a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i/ 
98a3('bum): phyir slob na/ uni nAm/ sAn+ti 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na
98a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sA 'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams ca/ da mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg
98a5('bum): pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du la bye dad pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
98a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
98a7('bum): myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na nas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
98a8('bum): sus kyi 'dus te rig pa 'dod cags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob gangs pa bas sa byed ma khye da pa nyid du zam pa yinan mo// sum kyi 'dus te rig pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir mo ba rnarnam pamapa sa
98b1('bum): sol ste lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
98b2('bum): slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob
98b3('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung
98b4('bum): ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khye nang po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
98b5('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyedad pa nyid du slob pa yin na/ ma/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag/ par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
98b6('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
98b7('bum): tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid du slob pa yi minas/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob narnam pa thams
98b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ na ba'i 'dus te ren
99a1('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
99a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
99a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i
99a4('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yi na nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'azadapar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
99a5('bum): slob pa yin nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i
99a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce li 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob
99a7('bum): slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor

99b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te
99b2('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
99b3('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

104b3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
104b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhi na stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
104b5('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
104b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob
104b7('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos zas
104b8('bum): cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
105a1('bum): pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad stong pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
105a2('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
105a3('bum): pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
105a4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyi8ra slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
105a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi dmyi klas pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed
105a6('bum): papa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyenod pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
105a7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
105a8('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod
105b1('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
105b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
105b3('bum): yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i
105b4('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa dan nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'aste par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
105b5('bum): pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zad par bya/ ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dod chags
105b6('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin/ 
105b7('bum): nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhin zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
105b8('bum): par nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'gag par bya
106a1('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba ba'i myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ru
106a2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
106a3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
106a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nama'i/ dbang po lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya
106a5('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa/ yin nam/ dbang po lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam/ pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po
106a6('bum): lnga myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'dod
106a7('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs
106a8('bum): rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin
106b1('bum): ma/ bya chub kyis nalag bdun 'dod gas dang rgyum ldan pa dadus na ces rnam gyu rgya yan lag bdun 'gag par bya ba phyir slob sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob pa yin/ 
106b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan sag bdud kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir thol marnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob nanas pa mas
106b3('bum): cad nyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam
106b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
106b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags
106b6('bum): pa'i bden pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
106b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob
106b8('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan
107a1('bum): bzhi 'aklag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan ba'i myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin
107a2('bum): nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
107a3('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
107a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i
107a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba 'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slobapa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
107a6('bum): bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
107a7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i
107a8('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par
107b1('bum): bar pa brgyad myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob pa yin nas mthar kyis gnas par snyoms par 'dug pa dgu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
107b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ 
107b3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi skye
107b4('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan man pa dang smond pa myed pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob
107b5('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob
107b6('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
107b7('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes/ 
107b8('bum): pa rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ 
108a1('bum): slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
108a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin de rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar
108a3('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin
108a4('bum): rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zad pa ra bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams nad mkhyend pa nyid du
108a5('bum): slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag
108a6('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin
108a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
108a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin
108b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
108b2('bum): slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
108b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'dzags pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zad
108b4('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'do da chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad/ 
108b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag
108b6('bum): par rig pa pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na/ 
108b7('bum): snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
108b8('bum): slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po myo skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
109a1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
109a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
109a3('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyu nad tu zhugs
109a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
109a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan
109a6('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyi slob na rnam pa
109a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ len cig phyir 'ong
109a8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
109b1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
109b2('bum): slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
109b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bya/ 
109b4('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
109b5('bum): rang byang chub zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
109b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
109b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
109b8('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lamo gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid
110a1('bum): du slob pa yin nas/ las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid zad par bya'o/ 
110a2('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
110a3('bum): yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'gag bA bya'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
110a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// bam po @
110a5('bum): rab 'byor da de ci snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par
110a6('bum): 'gyur ram/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par
110a7('bum): bya ba'i phyir slab na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am
110a8('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am/ 
110b1('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 
110b2('bum): lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spa ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzugs
110b3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad par bya ba'i 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ras/ dri'i de bzhin
110b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang pa 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ reg gi de bzhin
110b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de zad par 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag/ par 'gyur ram/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram
110b6('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am skyo ba 'am spang ba 'am 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am
110b7('bum): 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kang yin pa de zad par 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad
110b8('bum): pa'i spang ba 'am skye ba'i 'gas 'gyur ram/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa
111a1('bum): 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ napa'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin
111a2('bum): nam nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i 'dus
111a3('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 'azad pa 'am skye ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par
111a4('bum): 'gyur ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yi na ba de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
111a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni zad pa 'am ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'a/ gyur ram/ rna bo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba
111a6('bum): 'am 'gag pa 'gyur ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
111a7('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am spang ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi 'dus te rerig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin par zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye/ 
111a8('bum): ba 'am 'gag pa 'gyur ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
111b1('bum): gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mye'i khams kyi de
111b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ nam ma
111b3('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag
111b4('bum): par gyur/ ma rig pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba
111b5('bum): 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin// nyid ga yi ni pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'am/ ga par 'gyur ram/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
111b6('bum): gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ reg pa'i
111b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am sra ba 'am skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sred
111b8('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lend pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur
112a1('bum): 'gyur ram/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag
112a2('bum): nam par 'gyur ram/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am/ 
112a3('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de
112a4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye
112a5('bum): ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ shes rab kyi pha
112a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am skye ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag
112a7('bum): par 'gyur ram/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am
112a8('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'as spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
112b1('bum): de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'dus byas stong pa
112b2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'akag
112b3('bum): par 'gyur ram/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
112b4('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ra ram/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ ba de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram
112b5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad
112b6('bum): pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ myi dmyigs pa stong
112b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am
112b8('bum): 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
113a1('bum): gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur
113a2('bum): ram yang dag par spong ba bzhi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba
113a3('bum): 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dbang po lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ stobs lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa
113a4('bum): 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'aklag par 'gyur ram/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'pha
113a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'phags po'i bden pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
113a6('bum): zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ bsam gtan bzhi'o de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ tshad myed pa bzhi'o/ 
113a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa'i bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba
113a8('bum): 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par tha dad pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mthar kyis gnas po'i snyoms par 'dug
113b1('bum): pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par myi 'gyur ram/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
113b2('bum): ba de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ting nge 'dzind
113b3('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par
113b4('bum): 'gyur ram/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin
113b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba'am 'gag par 'gyu ra ram/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid ka/ ngo yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag
113b6('bum): par 'gyur ram/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ka po yin pa de spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa
113b7('bum): 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lan cig phyir 'ong
113b8('bum): bo'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am
114a1('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang
114a2('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ la mo gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam
114a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gsheg/ 
114a4('bum): pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' destsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ 
114a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin/ de bzhin nyid ni zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ba myed de/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byed
114a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid du slob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
114a7('bum): dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha ro lad tu phyind pa la slob po yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob
114a8('bum): pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin nam/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
114b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor da de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol
114b2('bum): tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar spro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin// rab 'byor de de ltar
114b3('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ning stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor da de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa
114b4('bum): yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa nad pa/ rab 'byor du de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
114b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sgo ba pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chen po stong pa nyid la slob
114b6('bum): pa smin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
114b7('bum): po ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa
114b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thog ma dang tha ma myed
115a1('bum): stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la slob pa sbyin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
115a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin
115a3('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
115a4('bum): chen po ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 
115a5('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa na/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
115a6('bum): dpa' chen po ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin// 
115a7('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
115a8('bum): po na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byas
115b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 
115b2('bum): rab 'byor dede ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor da de ltar skyob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
115b3('bum): chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'o la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan pa'i la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor da de ltar
115b4('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshad myed pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor da de la dar na slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
115b5('bum): nigazugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad
