140b2('bum): ni snying po myed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snying po myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// bsam
140b3('bum): gtan rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// rnam par thard pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o/ 
140b4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nga po myed pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa ni snying po myed pa'o// mngon
140b5('bum): bar shes pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnam sa ni snying po myed pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snying po skye da pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni snying/ 
140b6('bum): po myed pa'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// snying rje chen po na snying po myed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
140b7('bum): brgyad ni snying po myed pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
140b8('bum): de na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pas ni snying po nyid kyang myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na snying po la dmyigs
141a1('bum): pa lta ga la yod/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu shin du mang ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bla na myed pa yang
141a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed pa dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di ji skad du bstand pa 'di la spyod pa dang / don 'di la spyod kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang
141a3('bum): mngon du byas pas/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du myi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya ba'i gnas so// rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems
141a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mnyam pa nyid 'di mngon bar myi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o// de nas che dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces
141a5('bum): smras so// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni chos kyi mnyam pa nyid gang mngon du byas pas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par/ 
141a6('bum): 'gyur ba de mngon du myi bya ba de ni myi dka'i/ lha'i bu dag sems can chad myed grangs myed dpag du myed pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes go cha bgos la// yang yongs su mya ngan las
141a7('bum): bzla bar bya ba'i sems can de dag shin du myi dmyigs pa de dag la de bas dka' ba ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar bya'o zhes bya/ 
141a8('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/ gang sems can 'dul bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' 'dul bar sems pa dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam ma
141b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par lta'o// nam mkha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can stong pa nyid du lta/ nam mkha' snying po myed pa nyid kyi phyir sems can snying po myed pa nyid du lta/ nam mkha'
141b2('bum): gsog gi phyir sems can gsog du lnga'o// lha'i bu dag rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can myed par kya na tsan / na kyi na byed de da pa
141b3('bum): par 'dod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha de yang bgos la/ sems can gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha bgos pa'i sems can de/ 
141b4('bum): dag kyang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dben pa'i phyir go cha dben par blta'o// gal te de ltar bstand pa'i cha/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
141b5('bum): chen po zhum par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod/ pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da
141b6('bum): dad 'ang ma sa 'a sems kyi ga shin da tu med pa ga 'atu canas yo byen 'byor sems pad de nga / sen pa'abyu mas ra do ba'o// sa be pa bya sems pad na'o// de byo me
141b7('bum): can dben pa'/ yid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sgra dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dri dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
141b8('bum): ba'o// ro dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// reg dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// chos dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems
142a1('bum): na ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sA'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// can
142a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sA
142a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus
142a4('bum): te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yid kyi' dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir dben pa'o// myig gi 'dus te/ reg pa'i las byung ba tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
142a5('bum): pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa 'o phyir sems can dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lce'i
142a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i
142a7('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can
142a8('bum): dben pa'o// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
142b1('bum): ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems
142b2('bum): can dben pa'o// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sred pa dben pa'i phyir slob na
142b3('bum): sems can dben pa'o// le nad pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// srid pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// skye ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rga shi dben pa'i phyir sems
142b4('bum): can dben pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// bzod pa'i
142b5('bum): pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o phyir sems can dben pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'i phyir sem/ sa can dben pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa
142b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid dang sum
142b7('bum): dben pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
142b8('bum): ba'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'o phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir rim
143a1('bum): dben pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
143a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// myi dmyigs
143a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dben / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
143a4('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir dben pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ 
143a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dbang po lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// stong/ sa lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// byang chub
143a6('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems
143a7('bum): can dben pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// tshad myed pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dben pa'i
143a8('bum): ba'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rnam par thard pa brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ 
143b1('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// ting nge 'dzin da/ 
143b2('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// myi 'jigs
143b3('bum): pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// byams pa chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// snying rje chen
143b4('bum): po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems ca/ na dben pa'o// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben
143b5('bum): ba'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong dupas dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
143b6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// nam
143b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
143b8('bum): shes rab bas po da / gzugs dben pa'i phyir zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben no// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o/ 
144a1('bum): sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dben pa'o// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// mye'i khams dber ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
144a2('bum): dben pa'o// rlung gi khams dben ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes
144a3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa dpe na ba'i phyir/ 
144a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa dben pa'o// skye mched drug dang na ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa dben pa'o// reg pa
144a5('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// sred pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben po// 
144a6('bum): len pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// srid pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// skye ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 
144a7('bum): ni dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa dber ba'o// sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir
144a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa dben pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
144b1('bum): byi nad pa dben pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 
144b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
144b3('bum): phyind pa dben pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i
144b4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dper ba'o// 'dus byas s+ho/ nga pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144b5('bum): pa dben pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab phyi rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa ste/ nga ba nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 
144b6('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyi'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ 
144b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o/ phyirang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben
144b8('bum): ba'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyin pa dben po dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa phyir shi rab kyi pha rol
144b9('bum): byedad pa ra pa'o// drang nye 'a sa dag pa da phyi she kyi 'ang tu byed pa de da'o/ yang ga par smos de de'i phyi gas sa kyi pha rol tu byo ring pa dben 'a'o / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dber pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa dben pa'o// dbanga'o
144'a1('bum): 'du shes dben pa'i phyim zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa dben pa / 'du sted dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par zhes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi sa
144'a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// myig dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rna ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rna ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kya nga
144'a3('bum): ralang tu phyind pa dben pa'o/ sna dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lce dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lus dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
144'a4('bum): pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// yid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// gzugs dben pa sa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// smra
144'a5('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dri dben pa'i phyir zhes rab kyi pha rol duphyind pa dben pa'o// ro dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
144'a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// reg dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// chos dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben
144'a7('bum): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinan pa dben pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi/ 
144'a8('bum): pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144'b1('bum): dben pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i
144'b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ 
144'b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro ldad tu phyind pa dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
144'b4('bum): du phyind pa dben pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher/ 
144'b5('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa 'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lce'i
144'b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa dben
144'b7('bum): ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa' phyir shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa dpan
144'b8('bum): ba'/ yang dag par spang ba dben pa'i phyar shes rab kyi pha rald tu phya nad pa dben pa'/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir shas rab kyi pha rald tu phya nad pa dben pa'/ dbang pa dben pa'
145a1('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du/ 
145a2('bum): phyind pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
145a3('bum): dben pa'o// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// 1sa/ byed pa'i ma pa 'ag pa da
145a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam par thard pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i
145a5('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon/ pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind
145a6('bum): pa dben pa'o// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// ting nge 'dzi nad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i
145a7('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// myi 'jigs pa ba'i dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
145a8('bum): pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// 
145b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lan cig
145b2('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dben
145b3('bum): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rolang du
145b4('bum): phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// / lha'i bu dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
145b5('bum): chen po chos thams cad dben par bshad pa la sems myi 'dzum yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur la/ de'i yid 'jigs par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
145b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dal 'di skad ces bka' stsa la pa// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir byang chub sem
145b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ba yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'
145b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dben pa dang zhi pa dang / ma skyes pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems
146a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zhus/ 
146a2('bum): napar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang / kang kis zhum par 'gyur ba dang / kang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma
146a3('bum): mchis pa ste/ dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de skad du bshad pa la myi zhum myi 'gong zhing / tshig chang ba dang sgyid lug par
146a4('bum): myi 'gyur la/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang
146a5('bum): zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ kang gis zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ gang la zhum par 'gyur ba 'om/ gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ 
146a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bgyi bar
146a7('bum): gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa// 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ni dbang po dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bzlas
146a8('bum): skye dku' bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis kying phyag bya bar yangal deg lag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dge rgyas dang 'bras bu che ba dang gdang gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha/ 
146b1('bum): rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la phyag bya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de
146b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs myed chad myed pa gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
146b3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i dgongs pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa yongs su rdzos
146b4('bum): par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
146b5('bum): du phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bsam ga tan gyi pha rol du phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
146b6('bum): pa'o// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid yod
146b7('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
146b8('bum): byed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzog pa
147a1('bum): par byed pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs/ 
147a2('bum): par byed pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// / 
147a3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
147a4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// da bang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
147a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam ya/ na lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'phra/ gas pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
147a6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam
147a7('bum): par thard pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
147a8('bum): ma myed pa dang smorgod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzung
147b1('bum): sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod
147b2('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs
147b3('bum): par byed pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang
147b4('bum): byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam pa tham// sa cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
147b5('bum): zhes dgongs pa mdzad de// rab 'byor da byang chubu sems drupa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa ni gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
147b6('bum): kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar zhugs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
147b7('bum): sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig to can mngon paru sprul pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bar chad bya bar myi nus so// rab
147b8('bum): 'byor de chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na des chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par
148a1('bum): nam yin deb la rgyapa can rnams nang bya stongs sgyum bdatung ba yin te/ rab 'byor dachos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig tan rnams/ 
148a2('bum): kyis kyi thub pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan sa she sa rab kyi pa ro steng du phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i bdud sdig stotsam rnams kyis kyi
148a3('bum): ma pa yin te/ gnyis gang ni na'i skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdza do// rab 'byor zhes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa la spyod pa'i bya
148a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa ni bdud sdig to con rnams kyis myi thub pa yin no// rA/ ba 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
148a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du ni lha'i bu rnams kyang 'ong bar sems me bsnyen bkur ba dang / yongs su 'dri ba dang kun dri ba yang skye dpar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
148a6('bum): myur du thob parar 'gyur gis de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pas rnam par spyod pa de nyid kyis rnam par spyod par gyis
148a7('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can 'akon myed pa rnams kyi 'gon du 'gyur ro// sems can skyabs myed pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur
148a8('bum): ro// sems can dpung gnyen myed pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro// sems can gnas myed pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro// sems can rten myed pa rnams kyi sems can rtend du 'gyur ro// seMs
148b1('bum): can ming byed pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ro// sems pas mun par gyurd pa rnams kyi sna bar 'gyur ro zhi des go ba skyed par 'gyug ci'i phyir me/ deni 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi 'ams tshad byed grangs myed pa dag/ 
148b2('bum): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig dge slong gi dge 'dun gis yongs su bskor te bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
148b3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod cing 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i yod// de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i mying da ris yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis
148b4('bum): chos stond cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad de/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na nga da ltar byang chub sems dpa' se dmas dpa' chen po ran can dpal gyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i
148b5('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phud kyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing ched du
148b6('bum): brjod pa yang ched du brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa'i zham 'bring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa
148b7('bum): dang ma bral ba de dag gi myong yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa bzhin no// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
148b8('bum): skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad
149a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te/ ched du brjod pa yang med du brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de
149a2('bum): dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te
149a3('bum): che du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems// 
149a4('bum): dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig chungs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang bral bar mdzad pa deka la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te ched du rjod
149a5('bum): pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyis sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems
149a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rold du phyi nad pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stom te ched du brjod pa yang ched
149a7('bum): du brjod pa mdzad do// byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' ses
149a8('bum): dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// 
149b1('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i
149b2('bum): spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang ma bral bar de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad de// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs
149b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha
149b4('bum): rol du phyind pa dang bral ba de dag la spro bA ma tra pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te ched du brjod pa lnga ched du 'arjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs/ mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig/ 
149b5('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
149b6('bum): dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyod
149b7('bum): ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i
149b8('bum): tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa'
150a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang ma bral bar de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod
150a2('bum): pa mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi la ma yongasu skye ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
150a3('bum): la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
150a4('bum): chen po kang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun myi 'chad pa'i don du bzhug/ rnas pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems/ 
150a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar myi ldog pa 'am gang kau myong yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos stond pa mdzad do// bcu ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da byang chub
150a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog pa las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa yang yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung ma bstand pa las shes rab kyi pha
150a7('bum): rol du phyind pa la spyod pa yang yod/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// gsol pa
150a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 
150b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul
150b2('bum): kyis chos stond cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad de// rab 'byor dkang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin cen dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i
150b3('bum): spyad pa spyod pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
150b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad skye ba myed par mos kyang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa/ chos thams cad stong pa'o/ 
150b5('bum): zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog gso ba ste/ rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang / snying po myed pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang myi skye
150b6('bum): ba'i phyir chos la bzod pa thob pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor dbyang
150b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub
150b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni nyen thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyis spangs pa yin te/ blar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yang lung bstand pa yin nam// rab
151a1('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis ched du brjod/ 
151a2('bum): pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir myi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// 
151a3('bum): rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo bshad pa thos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
151a4('bum): kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes nem nur myed cing the tshom myi za rmongs par myi 'gyur na des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
151a5('bum): rgyas myi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' theg pa/ pa'i rigs kyi bu 'a de dag las thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de yang shes rab
151a6('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di la mos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstand pa de bzhin du mos pas phyir myi ldog pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur te// 
151a7('bum): rab 'byor du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa thos na ni phan pa mang por 'gyur ba yin te/ gang gis mos shong mos nas de bzhin nyid la gnas
151a8('bum): pa dang / de bzhin du nan tan byed pa de dag kyang smos kyang myi smos te/ de dag de bzhin nyid la gnas de bzhin nyid la nan tan byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// 
151b1('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid du gnas nas de bzhin du nan tan bgyis nye/ chos gang la yang ma dmyigs na de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lags
151b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid la ma rtogs pa'i chos gang yang myi dmyigs na su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
151b3('bum): rgya bar 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos stond par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmyigs su ma mchis na de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ 
151b4('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon
151b5('bum): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gan sa shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni ga nas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
151b6('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor da khyod kyis gang 'di skad du kang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par
151b7('bum): 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos stond par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par gzhan du dmyigs su myed de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmyigs su myed na
151b8('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos stond
152a1('bum): par 'gyur ba sa ci som te/ de ni gnas byed do zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor dgang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / kang de ban/ 
152a2('bum): nyid la gnas te bran myed pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang sgrub dang gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos sonang par 'gyur ba de lta bu chos gang la yang de bzhin nyid sa
152a3('bum): gtogs par gzhan dmyigs su myed na de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang / 
152a4('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos stond par 'gyur ba lta ci sgo sa te de ni gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor// da de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung de bzhin gsheg
152a5('bum): pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin to// da dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid ni gnas pa'o// chos rnams
152a6('bum): kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myeng pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas myed pa ste/ rab 'byor de de bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de
152a7('bum): la gnas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba myed de/ de la gnas shing chos stond par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas myed do// de
152a8('bum): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
152b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang dmyig/ 
152b2('bum): su ma mchis te/ su yang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa mchis la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba gang yang ma mchis
152b3('bum): te/ chos stond pa gang yang ma mchis la des kyang zhum par yang myi 'gyur zhing de dag la nem nur du 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'i dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de nas gnas
152b4('bum): brtan rab 'byor kyis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad// ces smras so// ke'u shi ka gang khyod kyis ji skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
152b5('bum): chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du myi 'gyur/ rmongs pa ra myi 'gyur ba'i dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes gsold pa ni ke 'u shi ka chos thams cad ni stong pa yin na de la nem nur du
152b6('bum): 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba lta su zhig yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor da ni gang ji stond kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing stong pa de de la chags pa
152b7('bum): myed do// 'di lta ste dper na bar snang la 'phags pa'i med ni rtso la yang chags pa myed de/ de bzhin nyid du ka nas brtan rab 'byor kyis/ chos bstand pa yang ci la yang chags
152b8('bum): pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi cu rtsa dgu'o// 
153a1('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags bdag gis de skad du gsol te/ de skad du brjod nas bcom ldan
153a2('bum): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / ched du brjod cing chos kyis gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang dag par lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
153a3('bum): ke'u shi ka gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te/ de skad du brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / rjes su brjod cing chos kyis gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung stond par
153a4('bum): 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor da 'di ci dang ci spobs pa de thams cad stong pa nyid de brtsams shing spobs/ mtshan ma mchis pa nyid brtsams
153a5('bum): shing spobs/ smond pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spro// bas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa nyid brtsams shing / spobs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid brtsam
153a6('bum): shing spobs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa brtsams shing spobs/ bo rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pa nyid brtsams
153a7('bum): shing slob sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa nyid brtsams zhing spobs pa dang // nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spongs pa/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtsams shing spobs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
153a8('bum): shing spobs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chen po stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing
153b1('bum): spobs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
153b2('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ myi dmyigs pa stong
153b3('bum): pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dran
153b4('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams sboms shing spobs/ yang dag pa dar spong ba rnams rtsoms shing spobs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ dbang po rnams brtsams
153b5('bum): shing spobs/ stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs/ 'phams
153b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan rnams brtsams shing spobs/ tshad myed pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams
153b7('bum): shing spobs/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
153b8('bum): myed pa dang smond pa myed pa brtsams shing spobs/ mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ ting nge 'dzind rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams shing ba spobs/ 
154a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/ myi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ snying rje chen po
154a2('bum): du brtsams shing spobs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nas brtsams shing spobs// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba la rnams kyi gyur
154a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtsams shing spobs rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bcas shing spobs ngo mtshar che'o
154a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor de stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pas sbyin pa'i pha rold du phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang sbyin pa'i pha
154a5('bum): rol du phyind pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang tshul dri/ mas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bzod
154a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold du phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang brtson 'grus kyi pha
154a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa lta ji smos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa lta ji smos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
154a8('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa ci smos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji
154b1('bum): smom/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ chen/ 
154b2('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang chen po stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang kyi dmyigs pa/ gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus
154b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji smos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ka'adus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa ci smos/ mtha'
154b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang mthu' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji smem/ thog mdang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang thog ma
154b5('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji smos/ rdo ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dor brgya dpa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji smos/ rang bzhin sto/ 
154b6('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang chos tha cad stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rang gi
154b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa sna ci smos// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
154b8('bum): bsgom pa lta ji smos/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang phyi dmyigs na/ gang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji smos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang pom
155a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos// dran pa nye bar
155a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnaMs la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos
155a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dbang po rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dbang po rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stobs
155a4('bum): rnams kyang myi dmyigs na kang stobs rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang bya chu kyi ma dag rna pa rlom kyi sgog 'i me pan yud pa pa bye myig na ga gas pa'i sa 'anasan rgya
155a5('bum): spos/ la ga pa'i pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang 'phags pa'i bde na ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bsam gtan rnams la bsgom
155a6('bum): blta na smos/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ chad myed pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang gzugs myed pa'i sgod
155a7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang rnam par tha rad pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug
155a8('bum): pa dgu yang myi dmyigs na/ gang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsgom pa lnga ci smos/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pas
155b1('bum): dmyigs na/ gang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang mngon par shes pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 
155b2('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i la
155b3('bum): rno gyigaganas de shin/ shes na na kyi 'gas pan mas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsgom
155b4('bum): ba lta ci smos/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang snying rje chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos/ sangs rgya/ sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang
155b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mngon par smra ji smos// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi da gas na gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta
155b6('bum): ci smos// lam cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ pa lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang phyir myi 'o/ 
155b7('bum): ba'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang dgra bcom pa nyid rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ rang byang chub nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang byang chub rjes su thob pa lnga/ 
155b8('bum): ci smos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang rnam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rjes su thob pa'i lta ci smos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang rnam pa thams
156a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang ma skyes pa mngon du/ 
156a2('bum): byed pa lta ci smos/ mtshan rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lta ni smos/ dpe byad rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang rang gi lus la dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba lto ci
156a3('bum): smos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor da ni chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ dmyigs su myed pa la rnam par spyod/ stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod
156a4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa la rnam par spyod/ smond pa myed pa la na dam par spyod// ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi rna ma par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa'
156a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa la brgya'i char yang nye bar
156a6('bum): myi 'gro'o// spyong gi cher yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i tshor yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba'i stong gi char
156a7('bum): nye bar myi 'gro'o/ bye ba'i brgya phrag stong gi cher yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myo 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe' dang / rgyur yang myi 'azod
156a8('bum): do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa mya rtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyiring pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa'an
156b1('bum): yin pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang ni bI nim pa spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
156b2('bum): du phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o// rab ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa kong na myed pa mnyam pa myed pa
156b3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi mchog du gyurd par 'dod pas 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
156b4('bum): rolang tu phyind pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
156b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyon thos dang rang sangs rgya sa kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon byed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyod skye
156b6('bum): par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su sbyang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su
156b7('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rjes su rjes su thob nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyin mongs pa thams cad spangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra tse/ 
156b8('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// 
157a1('bum): denas 'khor de'i na nas sus ca gsum kyi lharnams me tog man
157a2('bum): ba mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor na to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// dge slong drug cu tsam yang stand las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig du gzar da te/ pus po g.yas
157a3('bum): pa'i spangs la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ka la der logs su thal mo sbyard pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myig 'dzum par lta zhing phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong de dag gis thal
157a4('bum): mo sbyar da te btud pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snyim pa men tog man da ra ba kang bar gyurd nas/ me tog man da ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
157a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab du gtor to// de ltar 'thor zhing mngon par ga tor ba dang / rab du 'thor ba'i tshe tshig 'di skad ces brjod de// 
157a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa'i rnam par spyod pa dam pas bdag cag rnam par spyod par gyurd cig ces smras pa dang / 
157a7('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gis bsam pa thugs su chud de/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de ste/ de ltar 'dzum pa
157a8('bum): mdzad pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'di lta ste/ 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dbar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnam
157b1('bum): pa sna tshogs byung ste/ de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rted kyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang nas phyir 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu ru bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan/ 
157b2('bum): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dka'o stan las langs te bla kos phrag pa gcig du byas te pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der
157b3('bum): logs su thal mo sbyar pa bdud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rgyu dang rkyend
157b4('bum): ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkye nad kyi sa 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
157b5('bum): to// dga' bo dge slong brgya phrag drug bcu po 'di dag la bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la bla na myed pa yang dag pa/ ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
157b6('bum): ste/ me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha staka 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dka' bo min tog sil ma zhes bya
157b7('bum): sa nin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun mtshungs par 'gyur/ de'i ched dkyang 'di lta ni/ lo gang rgya mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de dag sa
157b8('bum): na gang dang gang nas mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par byung nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab de dang de dag du me tog kha tog na pa lnga dang rna
158a1('bum): ba'i min tog gi char mngon par bab par 'gyur ro// dga' bo de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa'i dam pas rnam par spyad par 'dod pas shes
158a2('bum): ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa #/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa rnam par spyad par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa
158a3('bum): spyad par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo / myi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas
158a4('bum): 'dir skye ba 'am dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te/ myi'o nang du shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa zab mo 'ang rgya cher thos pa 'am/ dka' ldan rgya
158a5('bum): lha'i ris su shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'o zhes rtogs par rig par bya'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
158a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'dri la spyod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa gzigs ra ga/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
158a7('bum): bab mo 'di nyan pa dang / bos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa la zhes
158a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ston cing rjes su 'debs shing gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
158b1('bum): rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos par 'gyur/ gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgra bco
158b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skyed par gyurd to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya ste/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag gis
158b3('bum): ni nyan thos rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// dka' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag gis ni nyan thos rnams
158b4('bum): la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa nyan thos rnams las she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 2chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang don dang
158b5('bum): yi ge dang chos dang mthun par khong du chud par byed na/ dag 'bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag la ni de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
158b6('bum): sangs rgyas mngo/ du gyu rad to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o// dka' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ya
158b7('bum): bar gyurd na/ dka' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar rig par bya'o// 
158b8('bum): dka' bo rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lta yang myi slu ste/ nyan thos sam/ 
159a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas su gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dka' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pA dang / 
159a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
159a3('bum): pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi dang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // 
159a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas spyod pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa de dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
159a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod
159a6('bum): pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sa spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos
159a7('bum): po myed pa'i nga ba nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang
159a8('bum): po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag nams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden ma rjo
159b1('bum): la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyod pa/ 
159b2('bum): dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la
159b3('bum): spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so
159b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya/ de la spyod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod
159b5('bum): pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa dang / lam
159b6('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod pas rtogs par rig par bya'o// shin du rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i
159b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / 
159b8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / kyin stong pa nyid
160a1('bum): la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid// 
160a2('bum): la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
160a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong
160a4('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spro/ da pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod pa dang / rdzu
160a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la/ spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yon lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
160a6('bum): lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
160a7('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa/ 
160a8('bum): dang smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs / 
160b1('bum): la spyod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa
160b2('bum): dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyin sa sam rang sangs rgyas su myi 'gyur ro// dga'
160b3('bum): bo de bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa zab mo 'di khyod la btad de/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang ci snyed cig bshad pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind4 chos bstan pa de dag las na sh+tsa kun
160b4('bum): chub par byas nas de'i 'og du chud bzan te bor yang de tsam kyis dga' bo khyod la skyon du ngas kyi ci'o dga' bo gal te khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di gzung
160b5('bum): ste/ kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu gla zan tam por bar gyur na des dga' bo khyod ngas skyon du gzung ngo // dag 'bo des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di
160b6('bum): khyod la gtad kyis ci nas kyang bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / shin du yid la gzung bar gyis shig legs par yongs su zind pa dang / legs par kun chub
160b7('bum): pa dang / legs par bcang bar gyis shig/ yi ge dang tshig dang 'bru shin du rdzogs pa dang / nges pa'i cho ga legs par shin du zind par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
160b8('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa 'di 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
161a1('bum): sa byang chub gzung bar 'gyur ro// dka' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa des ni 'das pa dang / 
161a2('bum): rnam samyod pa dang ngasar byung ba'i songs rgyam coms ni 'das kyi byang chub mthun po'i yongs su 'thung bar rdzo'o// dga' bor shes kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu la gangs lag
161a3('bum): thun pa da nam gapa' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan kyis ma 'gror byags skye su dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyang
161a4('bum): rom tu phyind pa zab mo 'dra gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di gzung ste/ bcangs nas klags
161a5('bum): shing kun chub par bya ste/ men tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / kadu kas dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis rim 'gror bya
161a6('bum): sa sungs dang / da par ma ngas par 'gyu/ 'angs pa / mkhyen pa mangs kyil ldan das
161a7('bum): mchod par 'gyur ro// dka' bo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa la rim 'gro dang / dka' ba dang / mos pa skyed pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar/ 
161a8('bum): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim 'gro dang / dka' ba dang / mos pa skyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo kal te khyod la nga ldog cing yid du 'ong ba la yongs su ma btang zhe na/ 
161b1('bum): dga' bo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba yongs su myi btang bar gyis shig/ nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las tshig 'ga' yang khyod/ 
161b2('bum): kyis chung ma zos par gyis shig/ dka' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di btad pa brtsams te/ khyod la shin du mang du bstand pa yang mdor na dga' bo khyod la nga ci ltar stom
161b3('bum): par 'gyur ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di yang khyod kyi stond pa yin gyis dga' bo de bas na ngas khyod la chad myed par gtad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang
161b4('bum): khyed kyi stand pa yin rgyas dka' ba da bas na ngas khyad la tshad myed par btad pas shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yongs su btad de/ dga' bo de bas na lha
161b5('bum): dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten mdun du brjo da de/ sus sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang
161b6('bum): ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bco/ 
161b7('bum): ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su btang bar myi bya ste/ 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
161b8('bum): bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'phel ba byed de/ kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan
162a1('bum): la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di rnam grangs du mar rgya cher 'chad pa dang / stond pa dang / rab tu stond pa dang / shes par byed pa dang / rab du gzhog pa dang / 'grel/ 
162a2('bum): myen ma pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par
162a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang nye bar gyurd pa yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dka' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung
162a4('bum): ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ dka' bo 'das pa da'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
162a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadang
162a6('bum): pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
162a7('bum): pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung bar 'gyur ro// dka' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas chad myed/ sas du myed pa dag na de bzhin gshes
162a8('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ka ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyeng ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
162b1('bum): pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag du myed pa dag na de bzhin
162b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par
162b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na nub
162b4('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dang ga du myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ni snyed cig bzhugs
162b5('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa las byung
162b6('bum): ngo/ dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag du myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
162b7('bum): rgyas gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
162b8('bum): pa nyid las byung ngo / dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cad myed grangs myed dag byed da/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
163a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
163a2('bum): num pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin de pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus mashar gA'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag du myed
163a3('bum): pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
163a4('bum): pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyi da las byung ngo // dka' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na lho nu'od kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs
163a5('bum): myed dpag tu myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra sa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang kyi sangs rgyasasnyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa
163a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo / dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na nub byang
163a7('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag du myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig
163a8('bum): gzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // 
163b1('bum): dka' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chad myed grangs myed dpag du myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
163b2('bum): kang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid
163b3('bum): las byung ngo // dka' bo da ltar byung po'i dus na steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag du myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs hU~M/ 
163b4('bum): sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag/ dani bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang zhes
163b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // dag 'bo de bas na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / 
163b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa drug la bslab par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir ne
163b7('bum): na/ dka' bo 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirgod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma ste bskyed par byed pa'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
163b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa drug la slob pa de dag thams cad ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dga' po ri pa/ 
164a1('bum): na khyod la pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag yang btad do// rjes su btang do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dka' bo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs// 
164a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod de/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi mdzod do// zad myi shes pa'i chos kyi mdzad do// dga' bo phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed
164a3('bum): dpag tu myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
164a4('bum): de dag kyang pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi mdzod 'di la ston to// dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtso
