196b5('bum): po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du sems can no gcig gyi srog myi ga rtse do// ma byin par myi le nad to 'dod pas log par myi g.yem
196b6('bum): rdzun gyi tshig myi smra'o// phra ma'i tshig myi smra'o// zhe gcod pa'i tshig myi smra'o// tshig khyal ba myi smra'o// chags sems su myi byeda'o// gnod sems su myi byed do// log par myi lta'o// de'i sems kyang nyan thos
196b7('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la myi 'dug ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shizhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ ci nas
196b8('bum): kyang gang yongs su sngo ba dang / gang la yongs su sngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
197a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha
197a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
197a3('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu yongs su skyed de/ bdag gis dpag tshad dam/ dpag tshad brgya 'am/ dpag tshad stong ngam/ dpag tshad brgya phrag stong pa
197a4('bum): dpag tshad bye ba 'am/ dpag chad bye ba brgya 'am/ dpag tshad bye/ dab stong ngam/ dpag chad bye ba brgya phrag stong ngam/ dpag tshad phye dab khrag khrig brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya
197a5('bum): 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'am/ 2jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams
197a6('bum): bye ba stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du song ste/ de dag chung ngu na sems can 'ga' tsam yang skyabs su 'gro ba 'am
197a7('bum): srab pa'i gnas la gzhag par bya'o// bzod pa 'am rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang/ 
197a8('bum): byang chub bam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhag par bya'o// zhes brtson 'grus brtsom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing
197b1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyird pa la gnas shing // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyir
197b2('bum): pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzid
197b3('bum): to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin
197b4('bum): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byo rang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa 'pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 'dod pa las dben
197b5('bum): sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos las dben/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ 'byor pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so/ 
197b6('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// byams pa la nye bar sgrubs/ 
197b7('bum): te gnas so// snying rje la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// btang snyoms la nye bar sbubs te gnas so// nam mkha' yas skye mched la nye bar sbubs to ga nas
197b8('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so/ 
198a1('bum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// sems dang sems las 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ skyes pa thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
198a2('bum): pa nyid du yongs su sde'o// de yang ci nas kyang de'i tshe bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs pa de ltar yongs su sngo te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
198a3('bum): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing bas mi gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa yongs su 'dzin te/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
198a4('bum): pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom/ ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di la
198a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing gang gi tshe chos rnams la dpe ra pa'i rnam pa 'am zhi ba'i rnam pa 'am/ mya zad pa'i rnam
198a6('bum): pa 'am chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang snying po byang chub la de 'dug gi bar du chos nyid de mngon sum du myi byed/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gnas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
198a7('bum): byed do// de las langs nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo yang skor te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / shes rab
198a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// ci nas kyang myi spong bu 'dzin pa de yongasu 'dzind to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
198b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa la lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
198b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yin te/ bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya bar myi bya'i/ bdag gis
198b3('bum): gdon myi za bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes de sems can rnams kyi don tu dpag tshad dam dpag tshad brgya 'am dpag tshad stong ngam// dpag tshad brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi
198b4('bum): khams brgya'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba ste/ 
198b5('bum): ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag tu song zhing brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te// cung ngu na sem can 'ga' tsam yang byang chub la zhog go// gal te byang chub
198b6('bum): sems dpa' theg pa dang ma phrad na yang de dag tug zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni nyan thos la rab tu gzhog s+ho/ gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas la rab tu gzhog togo chung ngun
198b7('bum): sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu gzhog go// des chos kyi sbyin pa de yang sbyin pa de dag sbyin nas zang zing gyi sbyin pas sems can rnams tshim par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de
198b8('bum): yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo'o// gzhan du sems can thams cad thun mong du byos shing // bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste// rab
199a1('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
199a2('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'ad/ 
199a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug ga bir du bdag gyis kyang srog gcod pa spong ba yin
199a4('bum): gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin// srog gcod pal+lI legs pa brjod pa yin// gzhan yang srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa
199a5('bum): yin bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spong ba yin/ gzhan ya dang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ga/ zhan ga kr-i ma byind par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa
199a6('bum): rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang 'a// dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin// gzhan yang 'dod pa sa log par g.yem par spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin// 
199a7('bum): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g.ye ba spong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang rdzun
199a8('bum): du smra ba spangs pa ya~M ne// gzhan la kun du smral spo sa la ya dag par bskul ba yin/ kun du smra ba spong ba'i leg la 'arjod pa yid/ ka zhad gang kyis kur du u ba langs pa de gzhi leg pa 'arjod cing mthun 'daga' byud pa med zhan ga kyang bram smras pa hrI ga zhad yang ni ma sa pa ya dag tra sprul pa yir dri sbom di le ng+ge Ne badz+ra sa yi ga'ad na
199a9('bum): de ga / rnams sur kha dag gis kyang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/ gzhan gang gis/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin// bdag gse kyang
199b1('bum): tshig khyal ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang tshig khyal ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshig khyal pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gi tshig khyal pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
199b2('bum): bas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang chags sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yani/ gzhan gang gi
199b3('bum): chags sems spong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gakyi gnod sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang gnod sems spang ba'i lags pa brjod par yin// gnod
199b4('bum): sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa ya ni/ gzhan gang gis gnod sem sa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba
199b5('bum): byed pa yin bdag gis log par lta ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ lo// ga par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang
199b6('bum): gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun par byed pa yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa des 'dod pa'i khams su gnas par myi byed// sa / 
199b7('bum): par myi byed/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par myi byed do// gzhan du na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs zhe/ 
199b8('bum): byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ ci nas kyang yongs su sngo ba dang / gang gis yongs su sngo ba dang / gang la yongs su sngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar
200a1('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
200a2('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
200a3('bum): 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du myi 'gyur ba'i sems rnam par 'khrug par myi bye'om yan lag
200a4('bum): dang nyid rngubs shing khyer te/ dong yang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa de 'di snyam du bdag las ci zhig gcod/ bdag las
200a5('bum): ci zhig gtubs so// bdag las ci zhig khyer ro snyam myi sem sa te/ gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems s+ho/ phyir bdag gi lu sa yongs su rngubs pa de dag 'di ltar 'dir 'ong zhing yan lag
200a6('bum): dang nying lag bcad chubs nas khyer zhing 'dod pa na bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo snyam mo// de nas chos kyi rang bzhin ya pa legs par yid la bya bas ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
200a7('bum): kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sngo'i/ gzhan du sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// rab 'byor
200a8('bum): de ltaltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
200b1('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
200b2('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben sdig to mya dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang bde khang can
200b3('bum): bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyurd pas/ rtog pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
200b4('bum): skyes pa'i dka' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye par bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang / bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la
200b5('bum): te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa zhes brjod pa/ ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrub
200b6('bum): te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed/ btang snyoms pa dran pas yongs su dag
200b7('bum): pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad myed pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// sems can rnams la sdug/ 
200b8('bum): bsngal dang / bde ba myed pa'i 'du shes yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad myed pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de la gzugs me long du 'du shes shing nam mkha' la zhi bar 'du shes la yid la
201a1('bum): la byed pas/ nam mkha' mthal las skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas mos ma rgyache long du 'du shes shing // rnam par shes pa la zhi bar 'du shes yid la byed pas// rnam shes/ 
201a2('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par shes pa la tshe chung ngu 'du shes shipe/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la che long du
201a3('bum): 'du shes shing / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de bsam gtan dang tshad myed/ 
201a4('bum): pa dang gzugs myed pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par smind pa yongs su myi len te/ gzhan du na sems canarnams kyi den bya ba'i phyir de dag tu skye zhing // sems can de/ 
201a5('bum): dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol do tu phyi nid pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolar tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan
201a6('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag la yongs su smyidad par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i don tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan
201a7('bum): 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ rab 'byorade de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
201a8('bum): pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzi nad to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa ng+ges khyi myed
201b1('bum): pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khyo na ro ltad tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
201b2('bum): su myi mthong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi
201b3('bum): mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
201b4('bum): su myi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dngos po dang / rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // na dang stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par
201b5('bum): rjes su myi mthong ngo / phyi stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtsha na mar yang dag par rjes su mya mthong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi
201b6('bum): mthong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // don
201b7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong // 'dus ma byas
201b8('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdza dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo/ thog ma
202a1('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dngos pa dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi/ 
202a2('bum): mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong
202a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 
202a4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po drang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 
202a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // dran pa nye1bar gzhag pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang
202a6('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // yang dag pa spong ba bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mya mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rapa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi
202a7('bum): mthong ngo // dbang po lnga dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // stobs lnga dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dngos po
202a8('bum): dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dngos po
202b1('bum): dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // bsam gtan dang dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // chad myed pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 
202b2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rnam par thard pa brgyad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // mthar kyis gnas
202b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos pod tshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rnam par tha rad pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
202b4('bum): su myi mthong ngo / mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mya mthong ngo / ting nge 'dzind rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su
202b5('bum): myi mthong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtsha na mar yang dag par rjes su mya mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag
202b6('bum): par rjes su myi mthong ngo // myi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dngos dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
202b7('bum): su myi mthong ngo // snying rje chen po dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
202b8('bum): mya mthong ngo // thams cad shes pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong
203a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ chos thams cad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bas
203a2('bum): chos gang la yang gnas myi 'cha' zhing / de ji skad du smra ba de ltar byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shi
203a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// / bam pa
203a4('bum): gsol dad pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
203a5('bum): gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
203a6('bum): po 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mya dge ba'i chos kyis dben ka rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar smrags
203a7('bum): te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyurd pas rtog pa myed pa/ dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad las skyes
203a8('bum): pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dka' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin dang btang snyoms la gnas
203b1('bum): te bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te/ 
203b2('bum): gnas so// bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas nub pas de bde ba yang myed stug sngal yang myed pa btang snyoms dang / dran pas yongs su dag po'i bsam
203b3('bum): gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur da cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid
203b4('bum): la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam ma kha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
203b5('bum): par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so// zhes te rna ma shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched lnga/ 
203b6('bum): yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bsam gtan gyi pha rol de tu phyini pa de la gnas nas myi g.yeng ba'i yid kyis/ sems
203b7('bum): can de dag la zang zing gyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang zang zing gyi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi spyon pa la yang dag par skul la// zang zing gyi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa'i
203b8('bum): legs pa yang brjod do// gzhan gang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa yang brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtse ba de
204a1('bum): dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sngol/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs/ 
204a2('bum): su sngo ste/ rab 'byor dade de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin to// gsol pa bcom
204a3('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan
204a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol patuphyind pa la gnas pa'i sems 'dod chags dang ldan pa myi
204a5('bum): skyed// sems zhe sdang dang ldan pa myi skyed/ sems gti mug/ dang ldan pa myi skyed/ sems 'tshe ba dang ldan pa myi skyed do// gzhan du na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
204a6('bum): yid la byed pas rnam par spyod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyon thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sngo'i/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa/ 
204a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing // tshul khrims kyi pha
204a8('bum): rold tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha
204b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa la gnas
204b2('bum): shing / gzugs la dbu ba lta bur rab tu rtog/ tshor ba la chu bur lta bur rab tu rtog/ 'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur rab tu rtog/ 'du byed la chu shing lta bur rab tu rtog/ rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur rab
204b3('bum): tu rtog ste/ de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la so sor rtog cing / snying po myed par 'du shes la nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de de ltar so sor rtog pas de 'di snyam ste yan lag dang nyin lag bcad cing brngubs
204b4('bum): kyang su la gcod su la bcad/ lus na su'i lus// tshor ba/ na su'i tshor ba/ 'du shes na su'i 'du shes/ 'du byed na su/ de'i 'du byed/ rnam par shes pa na su'i rnam par shes pa/ 
204b5('bum): snyam ste/ de de ltar na so sor rtog pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ nga la stso pa dang bkyil ba byas na gnod sems skye ba de lta bu 'i gzhi ba gang yang gang zhig yod/ khyal ba yang gang zhig
204b6('bum): yod snyam ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinid pa yongs su 'dzind to// 
204b7('bum): gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin
204b8('bum): pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 'dod pas
205a1('bum): dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa// rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te/ 
205a2('bum): gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur pas rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga'
205a3('bum): ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus
205a4('bum): kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te
205a5('bum): gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug sngal ba yang spangs// shing yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba dang snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa btang snyoms
205a6('bum): dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gi yan lag de dag la yang mtshan mar mya 'dzind to// de de/ 
205a7('bum): ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul rnam pa dums nyams su myong bar byed de/ sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yol bar byed do// gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/ 
205a8('bum): mang por gyurd cing gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang ba dang myi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do// rtsag pa las thal ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa myed par
205b1('bum): 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sa la yang gyed du 'byung ba dang 'og tu 'byung bar byed de/ dper na tshul bya bzhin no// 
205b2('bum): tshu la yang bying ba myed par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya bzhin no// du bar 'phrul zhing myer 'bar te/ dpe ra mye'i phung po chen po bzhin no// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di lta
205b3('bum): mthu che zhing dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// de lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas/ lha dang mya'i sgra nye ba 'am ring yang
205b4('bum): rung ste thos so// des sems can pha rol dang gang za/ dag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba ba zhin du rab tu shes te/ 'dod chags dang 'an ba'i seMs
205b5('bum): la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i seMs
205b6('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang
205b7('bum): bral po'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhes so// / kati mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba
205b8('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred dang ldan pa ni
206a1('bum): sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji
206a2('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar lend pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar lend pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar lend pa myed pa'i
206a3('bum): sems la nye bar len pa myed pa'i sems shes bya ba bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhon
206a4('bum): du rab tu zhes so// rnam par spros pa'i sems la rnam par spros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// rgya chung ba'i sems la rgya chung ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang
206a5('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes
206a6('bum): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad myed pa'i sems la tshad myed pa'i sems zhes bya bar mdag pa ji ltar ba'i rab tu zhes so// mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag pa'i
206a7('bum): sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhes so// rnam par
206a8('bum): grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gang zag dang bcas pa'i sems la gang zag dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji
206b1('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa myed pa'i sems la zag pa myed pa'i sems zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i mi/ 
206b2('bum): zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na yod pa'i sems la za na yod
206b3('bum): pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na myed pa'i sems la bla na myed pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mra
206b4('bum): rjes su dran te/ sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i ba ra du yang rjes su dran no// nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi/ dam brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// zla ba gcig kyang rjes su
206b5('bum): dran la zla ba brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// lo gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas lo brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa cig kyang rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes
206b6('bum): su dran no// bskal pa brgya phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa stong phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskul pa brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rjes su
206b7('bum): dran to/ bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ mying ni 'di zhes bya// rus ni 'di zhes bya// rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni 'di srid gcig tu 'dug 'dug/ che'i mtha' ni
206b8('bum): 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas// dun
207a1('bum): rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan ka sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran no// de ni lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas sems can shau 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang kha tog sdu// / 
207a2('bum): pa dang / kha tog myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan// 
207a3('bum): byis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang / ngan 'gro
207a4('bum): log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sem das can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ da dag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis legs
207a5('bum): par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa myi 'deb sa pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho'i ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha'i ni
207a6('bum): du skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis rus pa/ nam mkha'i mtha'ar gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams
207a7('bum): kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la rab tu gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bste na bkur bya ba dang / yongs
207a8('bum): su dri ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sa
207b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ dge ba'i rtsa de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sngo'i/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
207b2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing ci nis kyang gang yongs su sngo ba dang / ci yongs su sngo ba dang / gang la yongs su sngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na bya
207b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
207b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags// bcom ldan 'das
207b5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinapa/ pa la gnas pas/ gzugs myi dmyigs so tshor ba myi dmyin/ 
207b6('bum): so/ 'du shes myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// myig myi dmyigs so// rna ba myi dmyigs so// sna myi dmyigs so// lce myi dmyigs so// lus
207b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid myi dmyigs so// gzugs myi dmyigs so// sgra myi dmyigs so// dri myi dmyigs so// ro mya dmyigs so// reg myi dmyigs so// chos myi dmyigs so// myig gi
207b8('bum): rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi
208a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyig so// 
208a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mya dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// 
208a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te re
208a4('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams myi myigs so// chu'i khams myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams myi
208a5('bum): dmyigs so// rlung kyi khams myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i kha mas myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myi dmyigs so// 
208a6('bum): rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug myi dmyigs so// reg pa myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myi dmyigs so// sred pa myi dmyigs so// lend pa myi dmyigs so// 
208a7('bum): srid pa myi dmyigs so// skye ba myi dmyigs so// rga shi myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi
208a8('bum): dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 
208b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyig so// 
208b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs
208b3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so
208b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi myi dmyigs so/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi myi dmyigs so// dbang po lnga myi dmyig/ 
208b5('bum): stobs lnga myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun myi ngomyi/ gas so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi myi dmyigs so// bsam gta/ 
208b6('bum): bzhi myi dmyags so// tshad myed pa bzhi myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa brgyad myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'du/ 
208b7('bum): pa dgu myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams myi dmyigs so// de gzungs kyi sgo rjes
208b8('bum): phyogs so/ de bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi dbyigs po / kyi 'jigs pa yini myi dmyigs songo/ ma mo yang dag par rig pa bani su dmyigs so// snying rje chen po myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma rje
209a1('bum): pa bco brgyad myi dmyigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 
209a2('bum): rang byang chub myi dmyigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigasaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi dmyigs so// / 'dus byas kyi khams myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas kyi khams myi dmyigs so/ 
209a3('bum): desar gyi dmyigs pas na mngon par 'du myi byed do// mngon par 'du myi byed pas nga/ skye bar gyi byed 'gag par myi byed do// de ci'i phyi lang/ rab 'byor de dri 'di ltar de bzhin gshenas pa rnams thung sa bdu ma da pa
209a4('bum): ma byung snga nub ste chos nas kyi chos kyi gnas nyid de ni gnas pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gnas pa'i phyir de myi skye myi 'gag pas de g.ye dra ba myed pa'i sems dang ldan par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
209a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba yin te/ rab la/ byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / shes ra
209a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags// bcom/ 
209a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par
209a8('bum): rjes su myi mthong ngo // gsoyod pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bgyi bar
209b1('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyig
209b2('bum): so// phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// chen
209b3('bum): po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi
209b4('bum): dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong po nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi dmyigs so// mtha/ 'a las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa ni/ 
209b5('bum): ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigaso dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba/ 
209b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
209b7('bum): nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po de dag la gnas shing / gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes
209b8('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes
210a1('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba myi dmyigs so// myig stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rna ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong
210a2('bum): zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// sna stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lce stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lus stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 
210a3('bum): yid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// sgra stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dri stong zhes bya ba
210a4('bum): 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// ro stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// reg stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// chos stong zhes bya ba 'am
210a5('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya na
210a6('bum): bar myi dmyigs so// me'i rnam par zhes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par zhes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par zhes
210a7('bum): pa stong zhes bya ba 'am mya stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sto ba zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya
210a8('bum): bar myi daphyogs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa gong zhes bya ba 'am mya stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar bya rimyigs so/ lus kyi 'dus te ren
210b1('bum): pa stong zhes bya ba 'am rgya stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// / myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi sto/ 
210b2('bum): zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// snal 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya
210b3('bum): par myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar
210b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par myi dmyigaso dasa'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs
210b5('bum): chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyig/ sa so// mye'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rlung kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong
210b6('bum): zhes bya bar mya dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa
210b7('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 
210b8('bum): myang dang gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba/ 
211a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// sred pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lend pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong ni
211a2('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so// srid pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// skye ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rga shi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi
211a3('bum): dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa/ 
211a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan
211a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba ra myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong zhe/ sa bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// nang
211a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar
211a7('bum): myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyi
211a8('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong
211b1('bum): zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyin
211b2('bum): so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong
211b3('bum): zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya
211b4('bum): par myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya / ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 
211b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myong/ stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs
211b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dbang po lnga stong zhes bya ba 'am mya
211b7('bum): stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// stobs lnga stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdud stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i
211b8('bum): lam yan lag pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong
212a1('bum): zhes bya bar myi dmyig so// tshad myed pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigaso/ 
212a2('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong/ 
212a3('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyig so// mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams stong zhes
212a4('bum): bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnam sa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes rgyanas
212a5('bum): na na kyang rgya rgyas / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba myi dmyigs so// snying rje che/ na po stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ 
212a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lan cis
212a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi
212a8('bum): stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rang byang chub stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 
212b1('bum): 'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
212b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / zas sam/ skom 'am bzhon pa 'am/ gos sam// me tog gam/ 'phreng ba 'am/ spos sam/ byug pa 'am/ mal cha'am/ gnas sam/ 'tsho 'am/ yo byad dam/ myi'i
212b3('bum): yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i sbyin pa gang dang / gang gtong ba des sbyin pa de stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // gang yongs su gtong ba dang / gang la yongs su gtong ba de yang stong zhes bya bar yang
212b4('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de la 'jungs pa'i sems yongs su 'dzind pa'i sems kyi skabs myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
212b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzu nga ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gyi bar du rnam par rtog pa/ de dag thams cad myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
212b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar 'jungs pa'i thugs sam/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i thugs myi mnga'
212b7('bum): ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pa la 'jungs pa'i sems sam/ yongs su 'dzind pa'i sems skye ba myed do// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
212b8('bum): tu phyind pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ichos stond pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing // 
213a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims
213a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 1
213a3('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i go skabs myi byed do// do ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gang yongs su sngo ba de ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la
213a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa 'ang myi dmyigs so// sems de yang myi dmyig/ sa so// de sems dang po bskyed pa nas// nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa/ 
213a5('bum): yin/ gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod// spang ba'o// lags pa brjod pa ya ni/ gzhan gang gyis srog gcod pa spangs
213a6('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthund pas dga' bar byed pa ya ni bdag gis kyang ma byind par lend pa spangs pa yin/ gzhan yod ma byind par lend pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ma
213a7('bum): byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin// gzhan gang bdag gis ma byen par lend pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin// bdag gis kyang 'dod pas lon
213a8('bum): bar g.yem pa spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis
213b1('bum): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dgal bar byed pa yan/ bdag gis kyang sngun du smra ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzun du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul pa yin
213b2('bum): brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin// gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang phra ma smra ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yA/ 
213b3('bum): phra ma smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ phra ma spong ba'i legs pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do// bdag gis/ 
213b4('bum): kyang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig spong / dba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa'i
213b5('bum): tshig spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba/ sa byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang tshig khyal pa spangs pa yinagazhan yang tshig khyal pa spong ba sa dag par skul ba yin/ tshig
213b6('bum): byal ba'i smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gso chogi khyal ba spyongs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gse chags sems langs pa yin/ gzhan
213b7('bum): yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ chags sems spong ba'i legs brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dag la
213b8('bum): bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis gnod sems spangs pa yin// gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis gnod/ 
214a1('bum): sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 
214a2('bum): log par lta ba spangs pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gise log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed par byed pa yin te// tshul khrims des nyan thos sam/ 
214a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos gnyis la chags par myi 'gyur na/ gzhan man chad lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / tshul
214a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gso lad pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing
214a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
214a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa skyes te/ de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang la yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am// 'chi ba 'am gshe ba
214a7('bum): 'am/ 'khyal ba 'am/ bcad pa 'am/ gtub pa 'am rdeg pa 'am/ 'ching ba myed do snyam pas de la sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gyi bar du/ kal
214a8('bum): te sems can thams cad drung du lpags nas 'byol te bkyang tam/ rdo byug gyis bdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btabs te/ bcad gtubs kyang de la 'od snyam ste/ kye mchos rnams kyi chos nyid
214b1('bum): 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di la chos gang yang myos pa 'am brkyang ba 'am/ bcad pa 'am// brngub pa 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ bcing ba skyed do snyam ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
214b2('bum): bo zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
214b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
214b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phru ngal gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de/ 'jig rten ga
214b5('bum): khams gcig gam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya 'am/ 2/ jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'am/ 'jig
214b6('bum): rten gyi khams bye ba brgya 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snying ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag snying ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgyal phrag stong dag tu song ste/ sems
214b7('bum): can rnams la chos ston cing / spyod pa'i pha rolang du phyind pa la rab tu 'god do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyirnyed pa la rab tu 'god do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi rang pa la rab tu 'god do// 
214b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la rab tu 'god do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning pa la rab tu 'god do// byang chub rgya
215a1('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rab tu 'god do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rab tu 'god do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bra
215a2('bum): bu la rab tu 'god do// dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do// rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do// de ci nas kyang 'dus byas
215a3('bum): kyi khams la rab tu 'god pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin pa de ltar rab tu bkod do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
215a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'a/ das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
215a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan/ gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom lda/ na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub
215a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzind la ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzind tam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzind tam/ 
215a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind kyang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzi ded gapa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzind de dag la gnas shing / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la lugs dang mthur pa dang / 
215a8('bum): lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'dug cing rnam par ldang ngo // brgyad gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'ang ni rnam par thar dpa
215b1('bum): dang po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang / ldan pas phyi royod kyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa gnyis pa mo// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par tha dad pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad
215b2('bum): du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du sheb rnams nub par gyurd cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mthal yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchen
215b3('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'od ni rnam par thard pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas
215b4('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// cung zad ma yod do zhes cung
215b5('bum): zad myed pa'i skye ma chad par skye mched las nye bar bsgrubs te// gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa tham sa cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das
215b6('bum): te/ 'du shes myong 'du shes myer myir skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin gyi skye mched las yang dag par 'a
215b7('bum): te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad pa'o// de ltar rnam par tha rad pa brgyad po 'di dag lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'du
215b8('bum): cing rnam par ldang ngo // mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang myi mthun pa la ltos par 'dug ci rnapa 'ang rtse/ dra gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dang
216a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben sdig to// myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po
216a2('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyurd pas rtog pa myed pa/ dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i
216a3('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus
216a4('bum): kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa la de ba rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrub/ 
216a5('bum): te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang ma/ ngas shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa btang stsan
216a6('bum): dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes
216a7('bum): rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du gas yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa las
216a8('bum): cad du dam mkha 'a mthal yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ nam shes pa mthal yas so zhes rnam zhes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa zas
216b1('bum): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mchen
216b2('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myir skye mched las yang dag 'das te/ 'du shes
216b3('bum): myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang myi mthun pa snyoms par 'jug ming
216b4('bum): rnam par ldang ngo // rnam par tha rad pa brgyad po de dag dang / maHrad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag rnam par phye ste/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par
216b5('bum): 'dug go// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tong nge 'dzind seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
216b6('bum): po 'dod pas dben sdig to mya dge ba'i chos kyis dben// rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa// dben pa las skyes pa'i dgo' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
216b7('bum): bsam gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gnyis pa langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ga
216b8('bum): pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas// nam mkha' mtha' brkye la snyoms par 'dug go// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched lnga/ 
217a1('bum): la langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'dug go// rnam zhes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms 'jug go// cung zad
217a2('bum): danin/ myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa la snyoms
217a3('bum): par 'dug go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin gyi skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// 'du zhes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs
217a4('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// cung / zad myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// rnam shes mtha' yas// 
217a5('bum): skye mched las langs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye ma ched la snyoms par 'jug go/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye/ mched las las nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms pa
217a6('bum): par 'dug go// bsam gtan bzhi pa las las nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'dug ko// bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug/ 
217a7('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan dang po snyoms par 'dug go// de seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di rnam par smyind par byas nas/ zod rgal gyi tong
217a8('bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'dug go// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thod rgal de gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'od la byang chub sems dpa' sems
217b1('bum): dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben sdig to mya dge ba'i chos kyis dben// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar smras
217b2('bum): te gnas so// bsam gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar

217b4('bum): mchod kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la// langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas kyi snyoms par 'dug pa
217b5('bum): la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar smras
217b6('bum): te gnas so// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jog pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed kyi ni skye mched kyi snyoms par 'dug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'dunas
217b7('bum): byed 'du zhes myed myin gyi skye mched kyi snyomos par 'dug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'dun 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'dun
217b8('bum): pa las yangs nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'dug go// bsam gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'gog pa'i snyom
218a1('bum): par 'dug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'dug go// bsam gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'dug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms/ das
218a2('bum): par 'dug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'dug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
218a3('bum): las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'dug go// bsam gtan bzhi pa la langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms pa la snyoms par 'dug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha'
218a4('bum): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms pA l+lAsA langs nas/ 2dgog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ 'gog pa/ 
218a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa la langs na dkri sa thal sa skye sa snyoms par 'dra/ nyeg pa la snyems par 'jug go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye ma da kyi snyoms pa ltas langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par
218a6('bum): 'dug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'du ga pa las langs nas cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched
218a7('bum): langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas// 'du shes myed 'du shes myen myor skye mched kyi snyoms par 'dug pas
218a8('bum): snyoms par 'dug go// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin gyi skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs ma/ 
218b1('bum): mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las langs nas// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'dug gong/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 
218b2('bum): las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so// mnyam par ma bzhag po'i sems las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched gi snyoms par 'jug pa la
218b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug go// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i seMs
