352a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'acom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin/ 
352a2('bum): pas stong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni byi stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / stong pa nyid
352a3('bum): stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong / don dam pa stong pa nyid don pa stong pa nyid kyis stong sa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus ma byas stong
352a4('bum): pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / thog ma dpa pa me myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dor ba
352a5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong // rang bzhi/ na stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong / chos thams cadastong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi mtshan
352a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / myi myigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / ngo bo nyid stong / 
352a7('bum): pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong
352a8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis stong / dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong / stobs rnams ni stobs rnams
352b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong / ting nge 'dzind rnams ni ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis stong / gzungs kyi sgo mas ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / de bzhin gsheg pa pa'i
352b2('bum): spobs bcu mi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spob sa bcus song phyi 'jigs pa bzhin myi 'jigs pa bzhis stong/ so so yang dag par rig pa lazhinam po yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong/ byams pa chen pon byas pa
352b3('bum): pa chen pos stong nga rje chen po na snyi rje chen pos stong/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma rgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis song chunang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyudad tu zhugs pa'i
352b4('bum): 'bral bum po lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni men cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sa song / phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras buni phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus song/ dgra bcob sngo ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis song / rang byang chub d+hA na na
354a1('bum): da 'a rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis myong / thobs rnams ni thobs rnams kyis thong / byang chub kyisan la garnams ni bya chub kyis na sa garnams kyis thong/ 'phags pa'i sam sa nas ga lung
354a2('bum): ba mi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang bas song / 'phags pa'i bdes pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i 'den pa rnams kyis stong / bsam gtad rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong / tshad byed pa rnams
354a3('bum): ni ched myed pa rnams kyis stong / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis tong / 
354a4('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dkunas rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyim tshangarnam par ba rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
354a5('bum): smond pa myed pas stong / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma mkhor shes pa rnabs kyis spong / ting nge 'dzind dmas ni to'adzin nams kyis stong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo
354a6('bum): nams kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis stong / phyi 'jishes pa bzhi ro myo 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong / sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhin so so yang dag
354a7('bum): par rig pa rnams kyis stong / byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos spong / snying nge ses pa ngo song de chen pos spo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
354a8('bum): stong // rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mya 'ong
354b1('bum): pa'i bras su song / dgral bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis song / rang bya ba chub sa rang byang chub kyis // seMm gan sa bzhes pa nyid ni las shirnam pa nyid kyis nying / tham byed pa sa ngan par rjog pa
354b2('bum): pa'i byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong na/ bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa rnal pa
354b3('bum): rab 'byor dpyod pa myed pa byed par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyimed pa'i gyod pa'o// nyid gad gan na no// 
354b4('bum): pa mo// bam po gnyis gas// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spyod pa ma mchis pa shes rab kyi
354b5('bum): rold tu phyind pa'i spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa yang myi dbyags/ byang chub sems dpa' snang
354b6('bum): bya dmyigs/ spyod pa yang phyi dmyigs/ gang spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyod pa de yang myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor de gong la thos pa de dag thams cad myi dmyigs pa de ni/ byang chub seMs
354b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa myed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar spyod pa ma mchis pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i spyod pa
354b8('bum): banas na/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ji ltar 'khyad par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar
355a1('bum): las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nyid nas pa nyams te/ chos thams cad dmyigs su myed pa la bslab par bya'o// des sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe myi
355a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sbyin pa btang bar bya'o// tshul khrims bsrung ba'i che/ myi daphyogs pa 'i rdus gos nul khrims bsrung bar bya'o// bzod pa bsgrub pa'i tshe myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis bzod pa bsgrub par bya'o
355a3('bum): brtson 'grus thob pa'i/ kyi dmyigs pa'i nas gas 'thon zas bsam par bya'o// ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'dug pa'i/ myo dmyigs pa'i nus gis ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par
355a4('bum): bya'o// shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shes/ rab bsgom par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe myi dbyi/ kas pa'i tshul kas nang stong pa nyid bsgos par bya'o// / byi nga
355a5('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa'i che/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// phyinapa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ myi byas pa'i tshul kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// stong pa nyid
355a6('bum): stong pa nyid spros pa'i che/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i che/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sprom par bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom
355a7('bum): ba'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom
355a8('bum): ba'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 
355b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong
355b2('bum): pa nyid sgom par bya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// chos thams na skom bla'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
355b3('bum): bar bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// bya phyogs pa phying pa nyid sgom bumatsho/ bya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis kyi myigs pa
355b4('bum): pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i// tshe/ mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i
355b5('bum): tshul kas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// dngos po myed pa li ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 
355b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba
355b7('bum): nas skom par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa ba'i sgo ba'i che/ mya'i myigs pa'i tshul gis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nas skom par bya'o// dbang po nas sko ba'i tshe myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kI dbang po nas skom par bya'o// stobs nas spros pa'i ma myi dmyigasa'i tshul
356a1('bum): kyis stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan laka rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub yan lag rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan
356a2('bum): lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag pa sgom par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden
356a3('bum): ba rnams bsgom pa'i che/ bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya'o// tshad myed pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
356a4('bum): chad pa myed rnams sgom par bya'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i che/ myi dmyigs pa'i rdul/ kyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa
356a5('bum): bya'o// rnam par tha rad pa brkyang bsgom pa'i che/ phyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa rnams sgom par bya'o// mtha red kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku sgom pa'i cha
356a6('bum): dbyigs pa'i tshul kis ma sa dzad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa sgom pa'i sa/ byi dmyigs pa'i
356a7('bum): rgyal gyis rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ma tshan sa byed pa dang gnod pa byed pa nom par bya'o// mngon par shes pa rnam pa sgom pa kyi dbyig pa pa'i tshus kyis mngon par shes pa rnams rnam
356a8('bum): par bya'o// ting nge 'dzinang rnams sgom pa'i che/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ting nge ladzi nad nams 'anom par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgonams sgom pa'i ye/ phyi dmyigs pa'i nus kyis gzungs kyi non mas rlom
356b1('bum): rgya/ de 'azhi gshegs pa 'i thobs bcu thothos pa byi dmyigs pa'i nus kyis de bzhi gshegs pa'i stobs pacu nom par byar kyi 'jigs pa rnams rnam pa'am/ byi dbyigs pa'i rgyas kyis
356b2('bum): phyi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi smom pa'i tshe spyir myigs pa'i tshul gyis ma mo yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// byams pa chen po brnam
356b3('bum): phyi dmyigs pa'i chus gyis byams pa chen po bsgos par bya'o// dI mechen po bsgom pa'i phyi dmyigs pa'i tshus kyis snying je cher ba sgom par ra sangs rgyas kyi chos sa 'dres pa
356b4('bum): bco brkyang bsgom pa'i tshe phyi dmyigs pa'i chus kyis sangs rgyas kyi chom sa 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// thams cad bshes pa nyid rlom pa'i semyi dbyigs
356b5('bum): pa'i tshul kyis thams cad shes pa nyid sgom par bya'o// las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa'i che/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lam ki rnam pa zhes pa nyid bsgom par
356b6('bum): bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshi/ phyi dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// gsol
356b7('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das kyinas gyis na gyi dbyigs par 'gyur/ ci tsas kyis na dmyigs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa sa pa mi cam tu gnyis pa de tsas du dmyig pa te/ gnyis
356b8('bum): su byed pa ni myi dmyigs pa'o// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das gnyis shes bgyi ba 'i lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal maH ya pa ci'i tsam tul
357a1('bum): myig dang gzugs dang mi cal du na pa dang sgra dang / citsam tu sna dang dri dang / ro bci cam du lus dang reg bya dang / ci tsam tu yid dang chos dang / citsam du gzugs dang gzugs can dang / citsam du tshor ba dang
357a2('bum): tshom pa po dang / bi ces tu 'du shes dang 'du shes can dang / mchis tu 'du byed dang 'du byed pa dang / cicam turnam par shes pa rang das par shes par byed pa dang ci cab tu rtsig gi rnam par shes pa dang / byig gi rnam par shes pa
357a3('bum): can dang / citsas can pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / na ba'i rnam par shes pa can dang / cicas rgya gA'i rnam par shes pa dang / gA'i rnam par shes pa can dang / sas na the'i rnam pa shes pa bre'i rnam par shes paca
357a4('bum): cas tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / sus kyi rnam par shes pacas dang / sems tu me rnam par shes pa dang yid kyi rnam par shes paca dang / sems tu rtsig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / byig gi 'du
357a5('bum): par/ sa sa byan pa'i 'anas kyi reg pa lus te ga pa ma tu ma'i 'du she/ ma du bre'i bu bcog
357b1('bum): byed pa mam tu lus kyi 'dus te reg sa margas pa'i rkyen da kyis sor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te res pa'i rkyen dkyis tshor ba nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / cims su yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsho sa dpe yid kyi
357b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenas kyis tshor ba nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / ci tsam tu sa'i khams dpasa'i khams yongs su shes par byed pa dang / ci ces tu chu'i khams dang / chu'i khams yongs su shes par byed pa dang / cicas tu
357b3('bum): bye'i khas pa dang phye'i khams yongs sugs par byed pa dang 'i lu shems dang rlung gi sangs su zhes par byed pa dang / ci tsam kunam sa pa'i khams dang / nam ma pa'i khamam yongs su shes par byed pa dang / ci tsas surnas par zhes
357b4('bum): pa'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su shes par byed pa dang // ci cas tu ma rig pa dang ma rig pa bskyed pa dang / mi tsam tu 'du byed dang 'du byed pa dang / ci tsam tu rnam par shes pa nganapa pa
357b5('bum): shes pa can dang / ci tsas tu phying dang gzugs dang / myi dang gzugs can dang / ci tsam du skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug can dang / ci tsam tu reg pa dang reg par byed pa dang / ci tsam tu tshor ba dang tsho pa
357b6('bum): bo dang / ci tsam tu sred pa dang sred pa can dang / ci tsam du lend pa dang lend pa can dang / ci tsam tu len pa dang srid pa can dang / ci tsam tu skye ba dang skye ba'i chos can dang / ci tsam tu rga shi dang rga shi'i chos can dang / ci tsam tu sbyin
357b7('bum): pa dang sbyin pa gtong ba can dang / ci tsam tu tshul khrims dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / ci tsam tu bzod pa dang bzod pa can dang / ci tsam tu brtson 'grus dang brtson 'grus can dang / ci tsam tu bsam gtan dang bsam gtan
357b8('bum): can dang / ci tsam tu shes rab dang shes rab can dang / ci tsam tu nang stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / ci tsam tu phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam du phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
358a1('bum): stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu chen po stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam du don dam pa stong pa
358a2('bum): nying dang don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci cam tu 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsas mtha' las 'das
358a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang/ ci tsam tu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
358a4('bum): skom pa dang 'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang
358a5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / rtsi tsam du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / 
358a6('bum): ci tsam tu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid drang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ci tsam du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar
358a7('bum): gzhag pa rnams skom pa dang / ci tsam tu yang dag par spong ba rnams dang yang dag par spong ba rnams skom pa dang / ci tsam du rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sgom pa dang / ci tsam du dbang po rnams dang dbang
358a8('bum): po rnams sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu stobs rnams dang stobs rnams sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu 'phags pa'i lam yan laka brgyad pa dang
358b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang / ci tsam du bsam gtan rnams dang bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / ci tsam du
358b2('bum): rang byed pa rnams dang cad myed pa rnams skom pa dang / ci tsam tu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / gzugs byid pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skom pa dang / cims cu rnam par thar rapa brkyang dang
358b3('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad bsgom pa dang / ci tsam du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa dang / ci tsam rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang rnam par
358b4('bum): thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sgom pa dang / ci tsam mngon par shes pa rnams dang
358b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang / ci tsam du ting nge 'dzin rnaMs dang ting nge 'dzind rnams sgom pa dang / ci tsam du gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams skom pa dang / ci tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
358b6('bum): stobs bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang sgom pa dang / ci tsam du myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / myi 'jigs pa sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgom pa dang / 
358b7('bum): ci cas tu byams pa chen po dang byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu snying rje chen po dang snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom
358b8('bum): ba rang ci tsam du rgyu nab tu zhugs ba'i 'bras bu dang / rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / ci tsam tu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang lan cig phyir 'ong bI ka u da kyi cam tu phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir bya'o/ 
359a1('bum): khras bu zhom pa dang / ci tsam du dgra bcom pa nyid dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang / ci tsam tu rang byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas dang / ci tsam du lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / mi tsam du bla ma
359a2('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas te rab 'byor nga 'di dag ni gnyis so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ dmyigs su mchis pa myi dmyigs sam/ ma lags te dmyigs su ma mchis pa
359a3('bum): mchis pa myi dmyigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yas lang ba/ rab 'byor nga dmyigs su yod pa myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin te// dmyigs su byed pa gyi dmyigs pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor dmyigs pa dang myi dmyigs pa mnyam
359a4('bum): nyid ni myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dbyigs pa dang / kyi dmyigs pa mnyam pa nyid sa bslab par byan// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa po sa
359a5('bum): lamyod pa'i rtse/ dbyigs la mang kyi chags kyi dbyigs pas kyi chags pa lags na yod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon logs rab kyi pha ros tu phyidad pa la pyod pa sa nas ma mangs su rdzogs par bgyi/ 
359a6('bum): sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs nas ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ji ltar thob par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
359a7('bum): byind pa la myod pa ni dbyigs pa la gnas shings nas sa yongs su rdzogs par myi byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la myong ba'i che/ dbyigs pa la gnas te/ sa nas
359b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par mi nus pad/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyin pa yang dbyigs su byed/ byang chub kyang dmyigs su byed de gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pyod pa yang dmyigs su byed do// 
359b2('bum): rab 'byor de sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la myod par bya'o// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs su ma mchis ste/ gang byang chub tu gyod pa de yang dmyigs su
359b3('bum): ma mchim pa yan par 'o 'i khur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyiring pa la myod bas 'di ni gzugs so// 'din sor ba'o// 'di ni 'du shes so// 'di ni 'du byed do// 'dini nam/ 
359b4('bum): par shes pa'o// 'di ni byig ko/ 'di ni rna ba'o// 'di ni lnga'o// 'di ni sde'o// 'di ni lus po na du lding ni gzugs pa/ 'di ni sgraro/ 'di ni dri'o// 'di rolo// 'di ni rig ko/ 'di ni thos so// 
359b5('bum): 'di'i rtsig gi rnam par shes pa'o// 'di nin pa'i rnam par shes pa 'o// 'di ni snga'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa tsho/ 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi rnam par/ 
359b6('bum): pa'o// 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chod/ 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
359b7('bum): ba'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// 'di ni sa'i khams so// 'di ni chu'i khams so// 'di ni mye'i khams so/ 'di ni rlung gi khe gro/ 
360a1('bum): 'di ni nam mkha'i khams so// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so// 'di ni ma rig pa'o// 'di ni 'du byed do// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni mying dang gzugs so// 'di ni skye mched drug gi
360a2('bum): 'di ni reg pa'o// 'di ni tshor ba'o// 'di sred pa'o// 'di ni lend pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'o// 'di ni skye ba'o// 'di ni gzhi'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 
360a3('bum): 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni bsam ka tan ki pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do// 'di
360a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid do// 'di ni ning stong pa nyid do// 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do// 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'di ni 'dus ma byas
360a5('bum): pa nyid do/ 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa spong ba nyid do// 'di ni tho/ ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// 'di ni dong ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// 'a'adi chos thams cad stong pa
360a6('bum): nyi do// 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// 'dini myi dbyigs pa stong pa nyid do// 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// 'di ni ma bo nyid spong ba nyid do// 'di ni dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di dge
360a7('bum): ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ 'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// 'di dag ni nu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// 'di dag ni dbang po rnams so/ 'di dag ni spobs rnams so// 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yar
360a8('bum): laka rnams po 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams so// 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams so// 'di dag ni tshad myed pa rnams so// 'di dag ni gzugs byed/ 
360b1('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// 'di dag ni rnam par tha rad pa brkyang do// 'di dag ni mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku'o// 'di dag ni rnam par tha rad pa'i stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa
360b2('bum): myed pa'o// 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di dag ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 
360b3('bum): 'di dag ni so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o 'di ni byas pa chen po'o// 'di ni snying rje chen po'o/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ 
360b4('bum): 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// 'di ni rang byang chub bo// 'di ni lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid do// 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar
360b5('bum): chos thams cad rab tu rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHpad pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe
360b6('bum): 'di ltar byas pas gzugs dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 'du byed dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 
360b7('bum): myig dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rna ba dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / snga dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / sde dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / lus dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / yid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 
360b8('bum): gzugs dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / sgra dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / dri dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / ro dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / reg dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / chos dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 
361a1('bum): sdig gi nas par shes pa dbyigs par 'gyu ba dang / na ba'i das pa shes / 
361a2('bum): ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gum pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / byig gi 'dus te meg pa dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus kyi reg pa dbyigs pa
361a3('bum): 'gyur ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs par 'gyur
361a4('bum): ba dang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtsi kas par 'gyur ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis cho pa dbyigs pa la 'gyur ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
361a5('bum): kyis tshor ba dmyigs pa la 'gyur ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dbyigs pa la 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi 'as te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs pa la 'gyur ba dang / 
361a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / sa'i khams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / chu'i khams dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / mye'i khams dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rlung gi khas
361a7('bum): la dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha'i khams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rig pa dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 'du byed dmyigs par 'gyur ba rang
361a8('bum): rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / phyi la dang gzugs dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched drug dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / reg pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba dmyigs par 'gyur ba nga
361b1('bum): med pa dbyigs par 'grum ba dang / lend pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / med par dartsegs par 'gyur ba dang / sme ba dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / gzhi dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa'i pha rol tu phyin
361b2('bum): pa dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / bzor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang
361b3('bum): mapa gtan gyi sa mang tu byid pa dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi sa rom tu phyid pa dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rab stong pa nyid dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 
361b4('bum): phyinang stongs nyid dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid spong ba nyid dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid dbyigs pa 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang
361b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
361b6('bum): nyid dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs pa 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
361b7('bum): nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
361b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams dmyigs par 'gyur
362a1('bum): pa dang / dbang po rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
362a2('bum): dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
362a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
362a4('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs par
362a5('bum): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dmyigs par 'gyurar ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / so so/ yang dag par rig pa ba'i dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa
362a6('bum): chen po kyi dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rgyunang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dbyigs par 'gyur ba dang / 
362a7('bum): yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / lam
362a8('bum): ki rnam pa shes pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dmyigs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos rnams rtogs par myi byed do// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de
362b1('bum): sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs kyang myi dmyigs tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ 'du shes kyang kyi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyang byi dmyigs/ rnam par
362b2('bum): shes pa yang myi dmyigs myig kyang myi dbyigs/ na pa yang phyi dmyigs lnga yang myi dbyigs sre yang gyi dbyigs lus kyang myi dbyigs ming kyang kyi dmyigs// gzugs kyang phyi dbyigs zla sang gyi
362b3('bum): dbyigs/ dri yab phyi dmyigs ro yang myi dbyigs/ reg kyang myi dbyigs chos kyang myi dmyigs// sdig gi rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang phyi dbyigs/ lnga'i rnam par shes pa
362b4('bum): myi dmyigs/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang myi dbyigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang phyi dkyi kas// phyig gi 'dus te reg pa yang phyi dbyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus
362b5('bum): te reg pa yang myi dmyigs sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myi dbyigs yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ 
362b6('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyig/ 
362b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye rad kyis tshor ba yang phyi dbyigs yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang phyi dbyigs sa'i khams kyang myi dmyigs chu'i khams kyang myi dbyigs bye'i khams kyang phyi
362b8('bum): dmyigs/ rlung gi khams kyang myi dmyigs/ nam mkha'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang myi dmyigs ma rig pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa yang
363a1('bum): phyi dmyigs/ byi dang gzugs kyang kyi dmyigs skyes ched drug kyang phyi dbyigs reg pas myi dmyig sa chomatha sa gyi dbyigs// phreng pa yang gyi dbyi gyi 'chi kyi gyi sgra
363a2('bum): kyi dbyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gyi dbyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang phyi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyid pa
363a3('bum): dbyigs bsas gtan gi pha rol pa tu phyind pa yang myi dbyigs gas rab kyi pha rol du phyid pa yang kyi dbyin pa na thas nyid kyang gyi mig stong pa nyid byeng phyi dbyigs byin stong pa nyid kyang kyi byig/ 
363a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang phyi dmyigs/ chen po stong ba nyid pang dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gyi dmyigs 'dus stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi byin
363a5('bum): mamangasas 'das pa ma pa nyid kyar gyi dbyigs/ thogs dag byed pa slongs kyid dang / dor pa byed pa za ba nyid dang myor cig rang ba'i stong pa nyid kyang kyi dmyigs chos sems par slo ba nyid
363a6('bum): kyang kyi byig rang gi sa can nyid spong sa nyid kyang gyi dbyigs myi dbyigs pa spong ba nyid byer gyi dbyigs dang po po skyed pa spongs nyid kyang gyi dbyigs cho nyid spong ba nyid kyang kyi dbyigs dngos po byed pa'i
363a7('bum): thobs rnams kya rgya migs byang chub kyi phan la ga nams kyang kyi dbyigasabags pa'i san chung ba sa kyi sa rnams kyang gyi byig 'dum gta na
363b1('bum): phyi dbyigs chang byed pa rnams kyang phyi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam par tharapa pa brgyad kyang myi dbyigs mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shu yang phyi
363b2('bum): dbyigs rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stongo pa nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang smon babyed pa gyi dbyigs mngon par shes pa rnams kyang phyi dmyigs ting nge 'dzind nams kyang myi dbyigs/ gsungs kyi sgo rnams kyi dbyigs
363b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang myi dmyigs myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ byams pa chen po yang myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po yang myi dmyigs
363b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang myi dbyigs rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang phyi dbyigs yanang cig phyir 'om pa thab kyi byin kyi phyi bani 'bras bu sa kyi byis dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dbyig
363b5('bum): rang byang chub kyang phyi dmyigs las kyi rnas pa shes pa nyid kyang kyi dbyigs bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rgya'i dbyigs na/ lo 'i lur phyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinadapa sangs
363b6('bum): rdzogs pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / thamapag tu
363b7('bum): ki pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon ma mchis par 'dug par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgron ma mchis
363b8('bum): par nyung nas sangs rgyas kyi zhi'i yongs su sbyor bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyis nas sems can yongs su sbyind par bgyid par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su sbyind par 'gyi
364a1('bum): pa khye kyi rolas da pas skye myod // da sa da/ pa kyid na su byed / byed byed
364a2('bum): rab kyi pha ra tu phyid pal bya byad // rnam pa shes pa'i do zhes rab kyis byed pas kyi myong / byig mi dug pa byed pa myong // rnab dod tugs rab kyi ros pa bya
364a3('bum): bya/ sa byed du sa tu kyi kyi zhes ma du kyi pa gyur / 
364a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyi myod do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi myod // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi myod ngo // lce'i rnam par shes/ 
364b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas myi khyod do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu byedad pa la phyi byed do// sna'i 'dub te reg pa'i dod tushe pa rab tu ro'adu / 
364b2('bum): pa la myi myod ngo // s+ye'i 'dus te reg pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi pyod do// sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i dodan tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyir pyod do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i don tu she sa
364b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas kyi spyod do// byig gi 'dum ter ka pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i don du sbyin du sprul phyi byed do// na 'a'i 'dus te reg pa' las byung ba'i tshor ba'i ngos tu shes rab kyi pha ros
364b4('bum): byid pas myi myod // sna'i 'dul te reg pa la las byung ba'i chos ba'i don tu shes rab tu pha yol tu phyin pa la myi khyod do// skye bye tus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rom
364b5('bum): phyidad pa la myi byed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa sa myi byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la las byung ba'i tshor ba'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang
364b6('bum): zas myi myong ngo // pa'i khams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi khyod do// chu'i khams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyi khyod do// bye'i khams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang
364b7('bum): gyi myod do// rlung gi khams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyi byed // rnam mala'i khams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa sa myi myong / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi don tu zhes rab gi
365a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la myi khyod do// ma rig pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyin pas kyi khyod do// 'du byed kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dpal gyi myod do// rnam par shes pa'i don tu sde
365a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la byi pyod do// phying dang gzugs kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi dpyod do// skye mched drug gi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyi spyod do// reg pa'i don tu shes rab
365a3('bum): kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa la myi myod ngo // tshor ba'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyi myod do// zed pa'i ngos tu zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la myi pyod do/ lend pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa la gyi
365a4('bum): snod do// skying ba'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pas myi pyod ro// skye ba'i don tu shes rab kyi pha yo tu phyidad pas phyi pyod do// ga gi 'don tu shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyidad pa la byi myod du/ 
365a5('bum): grus kyi sa byed pa dud par 'du byed pa do tu zhes kyi sa kyi
365a6('bum): byed pa'i sa kyi rol tu byed papa byed / kyi na po'i bya bar ma sa kyidapa kyi khyod rjenyid kyi ngon shes rab kyi pha rol phyin
365a7('bum): kyi byor ro// phyi rang stong pa nyid kyi do tu shes rab kyi ni langs byed pas gyi byed do nyid stong pa nyid kyid kyin pa sa kyi ma sa tu byed ngos gA'i byod do / chen po stong pa nyid kyi dod shes
365b1('bum): do pa kyi rab byid pas myi byed do// mthams sa 'das papo da byed tu shes ras kyis sang na byed pa kyi byed de/ thogs dang sa skyed pa stong pa nyid kyis tu shesas tu byed
365b2('bum): da pa byeng da kyi tu pa kyis so da pa dkyings kyi zhesasu kyin
365b3('bum): ras po byed pa spongs nyid kyi don shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyid pas kyi khyod do// ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngon tu shes rab kyi pha rol du kyi rad pas kyi byed du dngam po byed pa mangs nyid stong pa nyi gyi
365b4('bum): da cig pa rab kyi pha ros pa byed pas gyi khyod du dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyingon tu shes rab kyis robang tu byed pas kyi byed do/ yang dag par 'ong garnams kyingos shes rab kyi sa song tu byird pas kyi phyo
365b5('bum): ngo// klu'achul gi rkang pa rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pas myi myod ngo/ dbang po rnam sa kyi da tu shes rab kyi pha 'obang tu byed pa la myi khyod do// spobs rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas
365b6('bum): byi byid ngo // byang chub kyi yang lag rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi khyod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa la gyi myod ro// 'phags pa'i bdes pa
366a1('bum): sa sa byed pa'i goms par 'jug pa nas kyi 'on tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyis pas kyi byed do/ ra da kyi gas ma tu nyid sa pa bad da parang kyis gnas pa'i
366a2('bum): 'byug pa gu da tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyi khyod do// rnamar tha da pa'i narung ba nyid dang mtshan pa med pa dang ston pa byeda'i don tu pa bkyi rol tu byed pal gyi khyod do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi/ 
366a3('bum): dan sa kyi pa phyin pa sa gyi da / 'dzi rnams rgyabyed do/ kyid kyigs rab kyi pha la tu phyid pas gyi byed // 
366a4('bum): de ba'i na gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'dod kyi shes rab kyis dadu pa sa mi byed do/ kyi 'as pa pa 'do na bkyi rolangs byedad pas kye byod nga pa so yang dag pa
366a5('bum): kyings pa 'das pa bco brgyad kyi 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol dun byed du pas kyi byed do// chum tu zhum sa pa'i 'bras bu dod tugs rab kyi pha ma tu byed pas byagyod do/ dacig kyi 'ong ba'i 'bras dus
366a6('bum): don tu shes rab kyi sa rol tu byind pa la gyi myong // byid phyi'ong ba'i 'bras bu don tu shes rab kyi rol na gyi rang bas gyi khyor // dgra bcom pa nyid kyi don cigs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa kyi myong do// rab rgyas
366b1('bum): 'ang shes rab kya rab tu byedang pa su kya nga / ba yinas bshes pa cad kyang ngatugs rab kyi sa bams kyidad pa byed / zan byed pasra da rdzogs pa'i byangasabakyi 'o tu
366b2('bum): rol tu byes dpas kyi byed do// gam yong pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi sad na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pogis rab kyi pha ma tu byed pas rgya yo gam pa sna 'das kyis pa
366b3('bum): yang gang gi khyis par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa do gis rab kyi pha rob na byi pa sa bya dang / dpe'i phyir med/ rani 'di gyur chom bams pa ni la byas pa de
366b4('bum): shes rab kyi sa rol tu phyin pa ma byas pa ste/ mngon par shus mi byas pa'o// byang chub mas byas pa ste/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa no// 
366b5('bum): dpa' yang 'dus ma byas pa se mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i tshul gyis she pa rab kyi
366b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pas khyad par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de la chos thams cad ma bgyis pa ste/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags na/ 'o na 'i ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs
366b7('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dang theg pa gsum po 'di dag rnas par dgod par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa dang/ rab 'byor ngam byas mngod par 'dus ma byas pa'i chos rnamasas min ma
366b8('bum): dgod pa gang yang dbyigs su byed de/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang mngon pa gyi bsam pa'i chos rnams la rnam par dkor pa dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir 'on/ de ni 'di ltar byis pa thos pa dang kyi ldan pa ma sa'i// 
367a1('bum): kyinas pa sa pa la mngon pa gyin na da dus ma pa'as mangs
367b1('bum): sa'i khams la mngon par med / su'i khams la mngon par nadang / kye'i khams la mngos pa mazhenang / rlung gi khams la mngon par zhed / nam latshams sa mngon par na dang / na ba she pa pasamapa ma mngon
367b2('bum): bar shen/ maris pa ma mngo par zhen/ 'du byed la mngon par zhedang / na par shes pa la mngon par zhe nang / bying dang gzugs pa mngon par zhe na / bye mched drug la mngon par zhen/ reg pa sa mngon par zhen
367b3('bum): pas mngon pam 'ad/ med pas mngon par med/ med pa ma mngon pa na dazad pas mngon par shes/ skyebs mngon par she gagis mngon pa zhen pa byed pa' pa pas mngon pad
367b4('bum): rgyal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen / brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen sond 'grus kyi sa rol tu gyi nad pa la mngon par nathams gtad kyi
367b5('bum): tu byed pa la mngon par shed/ zhes tu byed da pa la mngon panang stong bangon pa zhed/ da
367b6('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par zhe dang / tshong pa gyi tshong pa nyid la mngon par zhenachen po stong sa nyid la mngon par zhen don das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhed/ 'dus byas song pa nyid ma mdzes par/ 
367b7('bum): da/ ma sa rgyas tshong pa nyid la mngon par men/ mtha' las 'das pa som pa nyid la mngon pas nyin thog ma dpa pa ma byed pastong pa nyid la mngon par zhend/ ngong bzed
367b8('bum): spong ba nyid la mngon par shed/ rang bzhi spong ba byed la mang 'du ra chos par la tha sto pa nyid yumangon par 'ad/ rang gi las nang nyid song ba nyidas mngam par nan rkye
368a1('bum): mngon par shes phyi dmyigs pa song ba nyid ma mngon pa shedang / dngos po byed pa thong pa nyid pa mngon ci ni pa nyid song bcings mngon par me du / ringos po byed thar pa nyid grong ba nyid la mngo
368a2('bum): bar zhend// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhenang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sa mngon par zhen / rdzu 'phrul kyi sa pa rnams la mngon par zhes/ dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen/ spongs/ 
368b1('bum): na bsarnas bags pacing baman bar nad/ rnam pa thams pa sabyed pa cings mngan pa shenas dugs kyis rnam sems su byang ba gsas su byin pa sa ra ba
368b2('bum): byeng kyin gas par dbyigs so myig kyis rnam sems su byed kyang myi tu myigs so namam rlos sems su byed cing na bar dbyigs pa/ snas rlom sems su byed cing sar byeg pa po
368b3('bum): byam mas sems su byed cing ster dmyigs so/ sas kyi rnam sems su byed ci sras bkyigs / yid kyis sems su byed cing ying du myigs so// gzugs kyis
368b4('bum): ma rnam sems su byed cing rag tu dmyigs so chos kyis rlom sems su byed cing chos su dmyigs so// myig kyi rnas par shes pas rlom semasu byed cing byig gi rnam par shes par dmyigs so// na'i
368b5('bum): rnam par shes pa ma sems su byed cing na pa'i rnam par shes par dmyigs so ma'i rnam par shes pa rlom sems su byed cing lnga'i rnam par shes par dgyigam po sde'i rnam par shes ma rlom sems su
368b6('bum): byed cing lho'i rnam par shes par dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su byed cing lus kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs so/ yid kyi nam shes bya rlom sems su byed cing yid kyi rnam par la
369a1('bum): shes par dmyig sa// byig gi 'dul te reg pas tshul se sa du byed cing myig gi 'dus te rig par myin mthod nyid na ma'i 'dus kyi reg pas rlob sems su byed cingan pa'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs so// sA'i du
369a2('bum): kye ga pas chub sems byed cing gA'i 'dus te reg par daphyog so// lce'i 'dus te reg pas rlob sems su byed kyi bre'i dus the reg par dmyig sa so/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pas rnam sems byed cing lus kyi 'dus te reg
369a3('bum): dbyigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus kyi reg pas rnam sems su byed cing ying kyi 'dus kyi ga par dbyig pa 'o// rkyed gi chu kyi len pa'i rkyed kyis tshong thos rnam sems su byed cing myig gi 'dus kyi rig pa'i rkyen dkyis
369a4('bum): mas kyi sa tshab sems su byed cings 'grus kyi 'i yang kyi bams su med kyi khyon po po bya pas kyi ma rlo sems sa byed byeng bya'i 'ams su dbyigs so/ su she
369b1('bum): pas byed mi da parnam pa sa brgyang la bsas zed ci
370a1('bum): spong pa nyid tu dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmyig pa thong / mthamams 'das pa spong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed cing mtha' yas 'das
370a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs so// thog ma dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom mos su byed cing / thog sa dpa'as myed pa stong pa nyid tu dbyig sa/ ngor ba byed pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed cing do ba skyed pa stob pa nyid du byis/ 
370a3('bum): so/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis rlos sem su byed cing rang bzhin spong pa nyid tu dmyig so/ chos thams cad spong pa nyid kyis rlob sem su byed cing chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dbyig so// rang gi mtshan nyid spong pa nyid kyis rlom sems
370a4('bum): byed cing rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tu dmyigs so// myi dmyigs stong pa nyid kyis rlom sem su byed ning phyi dmyigs po/ dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sem su byed cing dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du/ 
370a5('bum): dbyigs pa zam nyid spongs nyid kyis chus sem su byed cing ngobo nyid nga sa nyid tu byin pa ba'i da po byed mamathan nyid do nyi kyis rab bems su byed cing dad papo byed pa'i ngab nyid spong ba nyid tu
370a6('bum): dbyeg so// drar pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis rlob sems su byed ming dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dbyigs so// yang dag par 'ong ba rnams kyis rlom smra byed cing yang dag par spong ba nam su dmyigs so/ rdzu 'bru
370a7('bum): krika nga pa rnams kyis rlom sems su byed cing cu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams su dbyigs so// dbang po rnams kyis rlob sems su byed cing dbang po nam pa kyi dbyig sa tha~M / stobs rnams kyis rlob sems su byed ci thobs nas su ba
370a8('bum): dmyigs so/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis rlol sems su byed cing byang chub kyi yan la ka rnam su dbyigs po// 'phags pa'i sam yas lag brgyad pas rlom sems su byed cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par
370b1('bum): rnam pas 'ad rgyad kyis rbab sems sa byed ci rnas pa bad pa brgyad du dbyigs pa da kyis gnas pa sa sas pa du jug pa sum chus sems su byed somasas kyis gnas pa'i thabs pa na
370b2('bum): sems su byed cing kyi 'jigs pa bani dmyigs pa ma ma sa dag pa dashe pa blaname pa sems su byed na pa ma ya dag par me bya'i dmyigs pa byams pamed pas su ma sems su byed kyi su mi
371a1('bum): so// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus rlom sems su byed cing rgyu dad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma myig pa ma ni lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus rlom sems su byed cing lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dbyig
371a2('bum): sol phyer myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus rlos sems su byed cing phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras sum dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed cing dgra bcom pa nyid du dbyigs so// rang byang chub kyis rlom sems su byed cing
371a3('bum): rang byang chub tu dbyigs po/ las gi nas bzhes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed cing sam ginas bshes pa nyid du dbyig sa so/ thaMr byed pas bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rlom sems su byed cing bra na myed pa yang dag
371a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmyigs te/ de 'di snyam du sems su bdag/ nga gis byang chub tu mdzad par rdzogs pam 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// thangs napa sems can rnams 'khor ba nas 'grol bar bya'o snyam du sems
371a5('bum): gi de de skam la bdag pa'i ma yin par rnas par rtog go/ des rab 'byor de ni 'di sar gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa dang / byig dang / 
371b1('bum): ga kyis / sa kyi 'chus te sa pa'i rkyen du kyis tshor pa dang / sa pa'i rkyen pa kyi satshor ba dang / sa'i 'ams dang / rgya'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / rung gi 'am pa don
371b2('bum): sa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnams dang / rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa dang / bye dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / nga ba dang / sred pa dang / da pa bang pa da
371b3('bum): skye ba dang / gzhi dang / byin pa'i la sa pas byed pa dang / tshul rnams kyi pha sang ma byed pa dang / bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa da brjod 'grus kyi pha yang tu sridad pa dang thamapa gtang gi sa mog kyid
371b4('bum): ra kyi pha rol tu byedad pa dang / da nyidanyi byin yongapa nyid da ma nyid ba pa nyid
371b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas sos nyid dang / 'dus pa bya ba drab nyid dang / mthar yas 'das 'dul ba nyid dang / thog dngapas byed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor bskyed pa spong ba nyid
371b6('bum): nyi bulas dran pa nye padag par 'o ba na u ma kyi rkang par bsdu da / ba nad
371b7('bum): ba gang 'phags pa'i 'ayi lan maca du gas pa'i bden parnam pa da mas gtu med byed pa rnasas dang / gzugs med pa'i pa tsug pa so
372a1('bum): sa pan pa phying 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar
372a2('bum): na stong pa nyid da / ma rgyan po dang / zod pa khyo / mngon por shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin
372a3('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgornams dang // de bzhin kau shegs pa'i stob sa bcu dang / TI 'jigasapa bzhi dang
372a4('bum): so so yang dag pa rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dadu/ snyi chen po da sangs rgyas kyi
372a5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa'i brgyad dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras pa dang / lan cig khyi ma rtse 'ong ba'i 'bras
